item.title: There's a Boots flash sale on ALL Fenty Beauty and Fenty Skin - but the discounts end soon
item.description: <p>October marks Black History Month and not many beauty brands have been more instrumental in the push for inclusivity within the industry than <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/fenty-beauty/"><strong>Fenty</strong></a>. To celebrate, <a class="aff_text" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=BEA---141021&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.boots.com%2Ffenty-beauty" rel="sponsored" title="Fenty beauty"><strong>Boots is currently offering 20% off everything from Fenty Beauty and Fenty Skin</strong></a> until 19 October, plus you&#39;ll get a free Fenty clutch bag and full-size mascara&nbsp;when you spend &pound;30 on Fenty Skin.</p> <p>Founded by <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/rihanna/"><strong>Rihanna</strong></a>, Fenty Beauty broke boundaries with its launch in 2017, releasing over 40 shades of foundation. It was well overdue and encouraged other global brands to make big changes.</p> <p><strong>MORE:&nbsp;<a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/healthandbeauty/20210907121109/best-beauty-advent-calendars-to-buy/">53 best beauty advent calendars you can shop now for Christmas 2021</a></strong></p> <p>As well as her bestselling foundations, primers and powders, Rihanna is an advocate for experimentation and Fenty Beauty offers a whole range of bold lip shades, luminizers and super glowy highlighters to play with.</p> <p>The 33-year-old megastar&nbsp;launched&nbsp;Fenty Skin in 2020,&nbsp;which is suitable for all skin types and tones.&nbsp;The skincare brand offers&nbsp;everything from serums to SPF moisturisers, and the reviews really speak for themselves. Scroll down to shop all of the must-have products with 20% off&hellip;</p> <p><img alt="Fenty-foundation" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/healthandbeauty/20211014123973/fenty-beauty-fenty-skin-sale-at-boots/0-598-766/fenty-foundation-z.jpg" title="Fenty-foundation" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Fenty Beauty PRO FILT&#39;R Soft Matte Longwear Foundation, was &pound;27 now &pound;21.60, <a class="aff_text" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=---141021&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.boots.com%2Ffenty-beauty-pro-filtr-soft-matte-longwear-foundation-10263262" rel="sponsored" title="Fenty beauty">Boots</a></strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=---141021&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.boots.com%2Ffenty-beauty-pro-filtr-soft-matte-longwear-foundation-10263262" rel="sponsored" title="Fenty beauty ">SHOP NOW</a></h6> <p>The product that started it all, Fenty Beauty&#39;s PRO FILT&#39;R Soft Matte Longwear Foundation is a buildable, medium-to-full coverage base that lasts all day. It&#39;s game-changing not just for its shade range, but for its weightless formula.</p> <p><img alt="fenty-beauty-primer" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/healthandbeauty/20211014123973/fenty-beauty-fenty-skin-sale-at-boots/0-598-767/fenty-beauty-primer-z.jpg" title="fenty-beauty-primer" /></p> <p href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=BEA-U25--141021&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.boots.com%2Ffenty-beauty-pro-filtr-instant-retouch-primer-10263100" rel="sponsored" title="Fenty beauty ">SHOP NOW</a></h6> <p>Shine-stopping and pore-diffusing, apply Fenty&#39;s bestselling primer for healthy radiance and flawless coverage.</p> <p><img alt="Fenty-beauty-lip-luminizer" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/healthandbeauty/20211014123973/fenty-beauty-fenty-skin-sale-at-boots/0-598-779/fenty-beauty-lip-luminizer-z.jpg" title="Fenty-beauty-lip-luminizer" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Fenty Beauty Gloss Bomb Universal Lip Luminizer, was &pound;17 now &pound;13.60,</strong><strong>&nbsp;<a title="Fenty beauty ">SHOP NOW</a></h6> <p>Fenty&#39;s iconic Lip Luminzers are the finishing touch you need in your makeup look. Making lips look fuller and smoother, you&#39;ll be hooked.</p> <p><img alt="Fenty-highlighter" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/healthandbeauty/20211014123973/fenty-beauty-fenty-skin-sale-at-boots/0-598-781/fenty-highlighter-z.jpg" title="Fenty-highlighter" /></p> <p rel="sponsored" title="Fenty beauty">Boots</a></strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" rel="sponsored" title="Fenty beauty ">SHOP NOW</a></h6> <p>Designed for your face and body, this one-of-a-kind highlighter is super silky and gives a beautiful glow.</p> <p><img alt="Fenty-skin-serum" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/healthandbeauty/20211014123973/fenty-beauty-fenty-skin-sale-at-boots/0-598-786/fenty-skin-serum-z.jpg" title="Fenty-skin-serum" /></p> <p title="Fenty beauty ">SHOP NOW</a></h6> <p>Fenty Skin&#39;s 2-in-1 toner-serum brightens and smooths while targeting dark spots and controlling oil production, all without being harsh on your skin. Rihanna herself says this is her favourite step in her skincare routine.</p> <p><img alt="Fenty-skin-moisturiser" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/healthandbeauty/20211014123973/fenty-beauty-fenty-skin-sale-at-boots/0-598-787/fenty-skin-moisturiser-z.jpg" title="Fenty-skin-moisturiser" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Fenty Skin Hydra Vizor Invisible Moisturizer SPF 30, was &pound;32 now &pound;25.60,&nbsp;<a class="aff_text" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=BEA-U25--141021&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.boots.com%2Ffenty-skin-hydra-vizor-invisible-moisturizer-spf30-10290216" rel="sponsored" title="Fenty beauty">Boots</a></strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=BEA-U25--141021&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.boots.com%2Ffenty-skin-hydra-vizor-invisible-moisturizer-spf30-10290216" rel="sponsored" title="Fenty beauty ">SHOP NOW</a></h6> <p>This daily moisturiser offers lightweight, oil-free hydration as well as SPF 30 and it&#39;s truly invisible on all skin tones. It&#39;s also a great base for makeup; prepare for zero pilling.</p> <p><img alt="Fenty-skin-cleanser" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/healthandbeauty/20211014123973/fenty-beauty-fenty-skin-sale-at-boots/0-599-648/fenty-skin-cleanser-z.jpg" title="Fenty-skin-cleanser" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Fenty Skin Remove-It-All Cleanser, was &pound;20&nbsp;now &pound;16,&nbsp;<a class="aff_text" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=BEA-U25--181021&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.boots.com%2Ffenty-skin-total-cleansr-remove-it-all-cleanser--10290214" rel="sponsored" title="Fenty beauty">Boots</a></strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=BEA-U25--181021&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.boots.com%2Ffenty-skin-total-cleansr-remove-it-all-cleanser--10290214" rel="sponsored" title="Fenty beauty ">SHOP NOW</a></h6> <p>The Fenty Skin cleanser&nbsp;removes dirt, oil, and every last bit&nbsp;of makeup without stripping or drying out your skin.</p> <p><a class="aff_text" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=BEA---141021&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.boots.com%2Ffenty-beauty" rel="sponsored" title="Fenty beauty"><strong>Shop the full collection</strong></a><strong>&nbsp;</strong>with 20% off online at Boots until 19 October.</p> <p style="font-size:12px"><em>HELLO!&#39;s selection is editorial and independently chosen &ndash; we only feature items our editors love and approve of. item.title: Megan Fox sets social media on fire with her new Boohoo collection
item.description: <p>Now that <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/megan-fox/"><strong>Megan Fox</strong></a> is back on the scene and making heads turn with her eye-catching ensembles, it was only right that she kicked off the fall with a major collab.&nbsp;</p> <p dir="ltr">The <em>Transformers</em> star has teamed up with <a class="aff_text" href="https://geni.us/megan-fox-boohoo" rel="sponsored" title="Megan Boohoo"><strong>Boohoo to launch a sizzling new collection</strong></a>, and it&#39;s available to shop right now.</p> <p dir="ltr"><strong>MORE:&nbsp;<a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/celebrity-style/20210922122346/megan-fox-kourtney-kardashian-risque-new-lingerie-photos/">Megan Fox and Kourtney Kardashian nearly broke the internet in daring new lingerie photos</a></strong></p> <fieldset class="video video-en" data-autoplay="false" data-idplayer="" data-idvideo="Lgx0MMOX" data-info="" data-isplayercodeneeded="true" data-loopvideo="false" data-provider="jwplayer" data-publication="hello" data-verticalvideo="false" data-videoads="false"><iframe frameborder="0" width="560" height="315" src="https://cdn.jwplayer.com/players/Lgx0MMOX-UU9GOUT4.html"></iframe></fieldset> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>WATCH: Megan Fox flashback - see her explain why she&#39;s not a &#39;bad girl&#39;</strong></p> <p dir="ltr">In the collection you&#39;ll find cool&nbsp;cutout mini dresses, chic co-ords, leather trench coats&nbsp;and even&nbsp;a letterman jacket topped with &lsquo;Ohio&rsquo;, which is a sweet tribute to her boyfriend Machine Gun Kelly.</p> <p dir="ltr"><img alt="Megan-Fox-boohoo-cut-out-dress" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/celebrity-style/20211012123825/megan-fox-cut-out-mini-dress-new-boohoo-collection/0-600-272/megan-fox-boohoo-cut-out-dress-z.jpg" title="Megan-Fox-boohoo-cut-out-dress" /></p> <p itemprop="name" style="text-align:center"><strong>Megan Fox plunge mini dress, $55/&pound;40, <a class="aff_text" href="https://geni.us/megan-fox-dress" rel="sponsored" title="Megan Fox Boohoo">Boohoo</a></strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://geni.us/megan-fox-dress" rel="sponsored" title="Megan Fox Boohoo">SHOP NOW</a></h6> <p dir="ltr">Megan announced the launch earlier this month, giving&nbsp;fans a sneak peek at it with a series of photos of herself wearing some of the looks that she shared on her Instagram feed and in her Story.</p> <p dir="ltr"><strong>&nbsp;MORE:&nbsp;<a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/celebrity-style/20210830120682/megan-fox-chiseled-abs-cutout-bodysuit/">Megan Fox&rsquo;s chiseled abs are unreal in a risqu&eacute; bodysuit you need to see</a></strong></p> <iframe width="320" height="320" frameBorder="0" src="https://www.instagram.com/p/CU71DQlNPEs/embed" frameborder="0"></iframe> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Megan&#39;s Boohoo collection is <a class="aff-text" href="https://geni.us/megan-fox-boohoo" rel="sponsored" title="Megan Fox Boohoo">available online now</a></strong></p> <p dir="ltr">&quot;7 days until my collection with&nbsp;<a href="https://www.instagram.com/boohoo/" tabindex="0">@boohoo</a>&nbsp;drops...including this universally relatable letterman jacket. Because there&rsquo;s tons of other reasons to love Ohio even if your boyfriend is not the People&rsquo;s Mayor of Cleveland,&quot; she captioned the post.</p> <p dir="ltr"><strong>RELATED: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/celebrity-style/20210722118117/megan-fox-sizzles-heart-shaped-bra-cut-out-catsuit/">Megan Fox sizzles in a heart-shaped bra that is giving us Lady Gaga vibes</a></strong></p> <p dir="ltr">Fans were quick to share their excitement in the comments, with one writing: &quot;Ooo I haven&rsquo;t seen it yet but I already want everything.&quot; Another added: &quot;Can&rsquo;t wait for this queen&quot;.&nbsp;</p> <p dir="ltr">The collection isn&#39;t just a variety of mini dresses, it also has&nbsp;a girl boss element with sleek suits and chic co-ords. There&#39;s&nbsp;a dreamy ivory belted wrap blazer paired with flared trousers that Megan can be seen wearing in a behind-the-scenes video that Boohoo&nbsp;posted on Instagram.&nbsp;</p> <iframe width="320" height="320" frameBorder="0" src="https://www.instagram.com/p/CU72CAYJdqx/embed" frameborder="0"></iframe> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Megan paid a subtle tribute to her boyfriend Machine Gun Kelly with her Ohio letterman jacket</strong></p> <p dir="ltr">Megan&rsquo;s stylist, Maeve Reilly, has helped her step outside of her comfort zone and into the hot girl looks she&rsquo;s been rocking for the last few months following her return to the spotlight.</p> <p dir="ltr">In an&nbsp;interview with <em>InStyle</em>, the star revealed she almost didn&rsquo;t wear the eye-popping cutout Mugler dress the style maven chose for her appearance at the Billboard Music Awards with boyfriend Machine Gun Kelly earlier this year until Maeve convinced her.&nbsp;</p> <p dir="ltr">&quot;My stylist was like, &#39;We want you to wear this,&#39; and I was like, &#39;I was just talking to God in the jungle, I&rsquo;m not ready to wear that,&#39;&quot; she said, adding that she had a sudden change of heart. &quot;I&rsquo;ll just have some Peruvian tobacco. I&rsquo;ll wear this thing,&quot; she quipped at the time.</p> <iframe width="320" height="320" frameBorder="0" src="https://www.instagram.com/p/CU77NP-Fc9y/embed" frameborder="0"></iframe> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Megan&#39;s collection includes dresses, chic co-ords and suits</strong></p> <p dir="ltr">The risk paid off. The dress made headlines - and essentially put Megan back on the map. In addition to her making fashion statements, the actress has made quite the comeback on screen too.</p> <p dir="ltr">Her latest film <em>Midnight in the Switchgrass</em> with Bruce Willis hit theaters July 23 - and she has two other films in the works for next year - dark comedy <em>Big Gold Brick </em>and sci-fi thriller <em>Aurora</em>.</p> <p dir="ltr"><strong>Read more <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/us/">HELLO! US</a> stories here&nbsp;</strong></p> <p><em><strong>Like this story?<a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/newsletter/?utm_source=article&amp;utm_medium=website&amp;utm_campaign=newsletter-signup"> Sign up to our newsletter</a> to get other stories like this delivered straight to your inbox.</strong></em></p> <p><em>HELLO!&#39;s selection is editorial and independently chosen &ndash; we only feature items our editors love and approve of. HELLO! may collect a share of sales or other compensation from the links on this page. To find out more visit our </em><a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/news/2019061174038/reader-information-on-affiliate-links/">FAQ page</a>.</p>
item.dc:creator: Brandi Fowler

item.title: These Halloween pyjamas are perfect for a cosy night in
item.description: <p>Lockdown may be long gone, but that doesn&#39;t mean our ideal&nbsp;<a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/halloween/"><strong>Halloween</strong></a>&nbsp;weekend isn&#39;t a night in front of the TV with scary films, lots of snacks and the comfiest set of&nbsp;Halloween&nbsp;PJs we can get our hands on.</p> <p><strong>RELATED:&nbsp;<a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/healthandbeauty/mother-and-baby/20211005123253/best-halloween-pyjamas-for-kids/">Kids&#39; Halloween pyjamas you&#39;ll love as much as they do</a></strong></p> <p><strong>MORE:</strong>&nbsp;<a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/news/20210917121676/halloween-costumes-for-adults/" rel="" target="_blank"><strong>39&nbsp;easy Halloween costume ideas for women this year</strong></a></p> <p>Whether they&#39;re for a girls&#39; night or family time,&nbsp;we&#39;ve found all of the best&nbsp;Halloween&nbsp;pyjamas available from the likes of ASOS, Urban Outfitters&nbsp;and Amazon. Here are 12&nbsp;of the best to shop online now&hellip;</p> <p><img alt="PLT-Halloween-pyjamas" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/news/20211006123209/halloween-pyjamas-for-women/0-595-20/plt-halloween-pyjamas-z.jpg" title="PLT-Halloween-pyjamas" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Halloween Trick Or Treat short set, &pound;14/$14, <a class="aff_text" href="https://geni.us/boohoo-pjs" rel="sponsored" title="Halloween pyjamas">Boohoo</a></strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://geni.us/boohoo-pjs" rel="sponsored" title="Halloween pyjamas"><strong>SHOP NOW</strong></a></h6> <p>Boohoo&#39;s Trick or Treat short set is perfect for a spooky sleepover.</p> <p><img alt="Boohoo-bite-me-romper" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/news/20211006123209/halloween-pyjamas-for-women/0-597-559/boohoo-bite-me-romper-z.jpg" title="Boohoo-bite-me-romper" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Bite Me PJ romper, &pound;15/$30, <a class="aff_text" href="https://geni.us/PLT-bit-me" rel="sponsored" title="Halloween pyjamas">Pretty Little Thing</a></strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://geni.us/PLT-bit-me" rel="sponsored" title="Halloween pyjamas"><strong>SHOP NOW</strong></a></h6> <p>Or&nbsp;go&nbsp;fierce with this Bite Me Halloween romper from Pretty Little Thing. It&#39;s super flattering, too.</p> <p><img alt="Pretty-Little-Thing-Halloween-romper" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/news/20211006123209/halloween-pyjamas-for-women/0-595-428/pretty-little-thing-halloween-romper-z.jpg" title="Pretty-Little-Thing-Halloween-romper" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Black boo romper, &pound;15/$30, <a class="aff_text" href="https://geni.us/PLT-romper" rel="sponsored" title="Halloween pyjamas">Pretty Little Thing</a></strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://geni.us/PLT-romper" rel="sponsored" title="Halloween pyjamas"><strong>SHOP NOW</strong></a></h6> <p>PLT also has this creepy but cute ghost motif Halloween romper in black.&nbsp;</p> <p><img alt="Nasty-Gal-halloween-pyjamas" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/news/20211006123209/halloween-pyjamas-for-women/0-595-436/nasty-gal-halloween-pyjamas-z.jpg" title="Nasty-Gal-halloween-pyjamas" /></p> <p data-ref="name" data-tau="product_details_name" id="editProductModalTitle" style="text-align:center"><strong>Night and day pyjama set,</strong>&nbsp;<strong>&pound;21/$24, <a class="aff_text" href="https://geni.us/nasty-gal-halloween" rel="sponsored" title="Halloween pyjamas">Nasty Gal</a></strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://geni.us/nasty-gal-halloween" rel="sponsored" title="Halloween pyjamas"><strong>SHOP NOW</strong></a></h6> <p>This&nbsp;celestial pyjama set from Nasty Gal is&nbsp;exactly what we want to wear&nbsp;for a&nbsp;night in this Halloween.</p> <p><img alt="Shein-halloween-ghost-pyjamas" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/news/20211006123209/halloween-pyjamas-for-women/0-595-22/shein-halloween-ghost-pyjamas-z.jpg" title="Shein-halloween-ghost-pyjamas" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Halloween graphic tee &amp; trousers PJ set, &pound;10.99/$14, <a class="aff_text" href="https://geni.us/shein-halloween-pjs-2" rel="sponsored" title="Halloween pyjamas">Shein</a></strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://geni.us/shein-halloween-pjs-2" rel="sponsored" title="Halloween pyjamas"><strong>SHOP NOW</strong></a></h6> <p>We love Shein&#39;s Halloween PJs and this ghoulish set even comes complete with an eye mask.</p> <p><img alt="Shein-halloween-pyjamas-2" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/news/20211006123209/halloween-pyjamas-for-women/0-595-389/shein-halloween-pyjamas-2-z.jpg" title="Shein-halloween-pyjamas-2" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Halloween print pyjama set, &pound;12.99/$16, <a class="aff_text" href="https://geni.us/shein-halloween-pjs" rel="sponsored" title="Halloween pyjamas">Shein</a></strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://geni.us/shein-halloween-pjs" rel="sponsored" title="Halloween pyjamas"><strong>SHOP NOW</strong></a></h6> <p>You&#39;ll want to wear this silky set in contrasting colours long past the Halloween weekend.</p> <p><img alt="Etsy-halloween-pyjamas" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/news/20211006123209/halloween-pyjamas-for-women/0-595-411/etsy-halloween-pyjamas-z.jpg" title="Etsy-halloween-pyjamas" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Halloween&nbsp;shorts and top pajamas set, &pound;32.24/$34.90,</strong><strong> <a class="aff_text" href="https://geni.us/etsy-halloween-pj" rel="sponsored" title="Halloween pyjamas">Etsy</a></strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://geni.us/etsy-halloween-pj" rel="sponsored" title="Halloween pyjamas"><strong>SHOP NOW</strong></a></h6> <p>These bestselling Halloween PJs from Etsy&nbsp;have over 500 five-star ratings. Available in seven different sizes, they&#39;re super soft and stretchy.</p> <p><img alt="Boohoo-Halloween-pjs-my-boo" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/news/20211006123209/halloween-pyjamas-for-women/0-597-550/boohoo-halloween-pjs-my-boo-z.jpg" title="Boohoo-Halloween-pjs-my-boo" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Halloween My Boo PJ set, &pound;10.50/$34.90, <a class="aff_text" href="https://geni.us/boohoo-my-boo-pjs" rel="sponsored" title="Halloween pyjamas">Etsy</a></strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://geni.us/boohoo-my-boo-pjs" rel="sponsored" title="Halloween pyjamas"><strong>SHOP NOW</strong></a></h6> <p>Cosy up in this very&nbsp;cute My Boo PJ set.&nbsp;</p> <p><img alt="ASOS-astrology-pyjamas" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/news/20211006123209/halloween-pyjamas-for-women/0-595-413/asos-astrology-pyjamas-z.jpg" title="ASOS-astrology-pyjamas" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>ASOS DESIGN astrology&nbsp;pyjama trouser</strong><strong>, &pound;16/$23, <a class="aff_text" href="https://geni.us/asos-astrology-pjs" rel="sponsored" title="Halloween pyjamas">ASOS</a></strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://geni.us/asos-astrology-pjs" rel="sponsored" title="Halloween pyjamas"><strong>SHOP NOW</strong></a></h6> <p>Obsessed with&nbsp;astrology? item.title: Amazon has slashed up to Â£150 off the price of Mrs Hinch's beloved hoover - hurry!
item.description: <p>As fans of <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/mrs-hinch/"><strong>Mrs Hinch</strong></a> &ndash; aka Sophie Hinchliffe &ndash; know, there&#39;s no-one better to go to for <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/brides/2020060591028/mrs-hinch-cleaning-hack-how-to-clean-jewellery/"><strong>cleaning hacks</strong></a> and <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/2020072394026/mrs-hinch-shoe-cleaning-hack-bargain-product/"><strong>tricks</strong></a> for keeping your home spotless.</p> <p><strong>RELATED:&nbsp;<a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/homes/2020031986574/mrs-hinch-cleaning-products/" rel="" target="_blank">19 of Mrs Hinch&#39;s top products for the ultimate deep clean</a></strong></p> <p>And of course, when it comes to the essential items you need for the clean home of dreams &ndash; she knows all the best tools and equipment you should invest in.&nbsp;So members of the Hinch army will be pleased to know, as will anyone who just wants to take the stress out of cleaning,&nbsp;that there&#39;s a great deal on her beloved Shark hoovers right now on <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/amazon/"><strong>Amazon</strong></a>.</p> <p><img alt="shark-amazon" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/homes/20210323109473/mrs-hinch-shark-vacuum-sale-amazon/0-528-511/shark-amazon-z.jpg" title="shark-amazon" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Shark Lift-Away upright vacuum cleaner, was &pound;249.99 now &pound;169.99, <a class="aff_text" href="https://geni.us/shark-blue-lift" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="shark hoover">Amazon</a></strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://geni.us/shark-blue-lift" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="shark hoover">SHOP NOW</a></h6> <p>If you&#39;re planning a major deep clean and house spruce up this spring, then one of these mean machines is a must! You can also use the wand to easily reach curtains, ceilings and light fittings.</p> <p><strong>MORE:&nbsp;<a item.title: Selfridges is selling a 007 advent calendar for James Bond fans
item.description: <p dir="ltr">Back with a license to thrill, <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/james-bond/"><strong>James Bond</strong></a> has officially returned to our&nbsp;big screens in <em>No Time To Die</em>, and with less than 100 days until Christmas, we&#39;re celebrating Britain&#39;s most iconic spy with the new <a class="aff_text" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=TOY-U250--&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.selfridges.com%2FGB%2Fen%2Fcat%2F007-james-bond-12-days-of-bond-paper-wrapped-advent-calendar_R03827971%2F%3FpreviewAttribute%3DMULTI%23" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="selfridges"><strong>007 Christmas advent calendar</strong></a>!</p> <p><strong>READ:&nbsp;<a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/film/20210929122802/no-time-to-die-james-bond-craig-bows-out-in-style/">James King&#39;s No Time to Die review: Craig Bows Out in Style</a></strong></p> <p>Exclusive to Selfridges, this festive find is dressed to kill with its glossy black and gold packaging. Retailing at &pound;199, inside you&#39;ll&nbsp;uncover 12 Bond-themed goodies ranging from prop replicas used in the actual films to sweet treats.&nbsp;</p> <p><img alt="bond-selfridges" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/film/20210929122869/james-bond-advent-calendar-selfridges/0-593-476/bond-selfridges-z.jpg" title="bond-selfridges" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>12 Days of Bond&nbsp;advent calendar, &pound;199, <a class="aff_text" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=TOY-U250--&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.selfridges.com%2FGB%2Fen%2Fcat%2F007-james-bond-12-days-of-bond-paper-wrapped-advent-calendar_R03827971%2F%3FpreviewAttribute%3DMULTI%23" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="selfridges">Selfridges</a></strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=TOY-U250--&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.selfridges.com%2FGB%2Fen%2Fcat%2F007-james-bond-12-days-of-bond-paper-wrapped-advent-calendar_R03827971%2F%3FpreviewAttribute%3DMULTI%23" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="selfridges">SHOP NOW</a></h6> <p dir="ltr">A real showstopper, this one-of-a-kind calendar even contains a poker chip and an accompanying certificate of authenticity which confirms that it&#39;s a genuine prop used in the 2006 film, <em>Casino Royale</em> &ndash; how cool is that?!&nbsp;</p> <p dir="ltr"><strong>SHOP:&nbsp;<a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/healthandbeauty/mother-and-baby/2020091096975/best-harry-potter-advent-calendars/">11 best Harry Potter advent calendars for Christmas 2021</a></strong></p> <p dir="ltr"><strong>MORE:&nbsp;<a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/healthandbeauty/skincare-and-fragrances/20210929122857/harrods-beauty-advent-calendar-2021/">The Harrods Beauty Advent Calendar for 2021 is as luxurious as you&#39;d expect</a></strong></p> <p><img alt="bond-poker-chip" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/film/20210929122869/james-bond-advent-calendar-selfridges/0-593-477/bond-poker-chip-z.jpg" title="bond-poker-chip" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>You&#39;ll even receive an authentic poker chip that was used as a prop in <em>Casino Royale</em></strong></p> <h3 dir="ltr">What&#39;s inside the 12 Days of Bond advent calendar?&nbsp;</h3> <p dir="ltr">Look away now if you want to keep the contents top secret! Behind the 12 doors of the 007 advent calendar, you&#39;ll find&hellip;</p> <ul dir="ltr"> <li>Casino Royale prop chip</li> <li>Gold bullet prop replica</li> <li>&#39;The agent&#39; 007 socks</li> <li>Dr. No silk pocket square&nbsp;</li> <li>Bond chocolate bars,&nbsp;</li> <li>The golden gun magnet</li> <li>Martini cocktail jig</li> <li>Safin mask keyring</li> <li>007 martini truffles</li> <li>Bond playing cards</li> <li>Dry martini popcorn</li> <li>Kamal Khan&#39;s lucky dice</li> </ul> <p style="font-size:12px"><em>HELLO!&#39;s selection is editorial and independently chosen &ndash; we only feature items our editors love and approve of. HELLO! may collect a share of sales or other compensation from the links on this page. To find out more visit our </em><a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/news/2019061174038/reader-information-on-affiliate-links/">FAQ page</a>.</p>
item.dc:creator: Megan Bull

item.title: 10 trending fashion items weâre loving on eBay right now
item.description: <p>We don&rsquo;t know about you, but our wardrobes need an overhaul with some new <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/autumn-fashion/"><strong>autumn fashion</strong></a> pieces &ndash; we always want to know what fashion is trending! And ther e&rsquo;s nothing quite like shopping the high street on <a class="aff_text" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fvlp2%2Fbrand-outlet%3Fmkcid%3D1%26amp%3Bmkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26amp%3Bsiteid%3D3%26amp%3Bcampid%3D5338837817%26amp%3Btoolid%3D20008%26amp%3Bmkevt%3D1" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="ebay brand outlet"><strong>eBay Brand Outlet</strong></a> for some seriously stylish affordable fashion.</p> <p>From cosy knits and striped jumpers to autumnal <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/news/20210825120392/best-floral-dresses-we-love/"><strong>floral dresses</strong></a>, chunky boots, <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/news/2020082796101/shop-best-trench-coats/"><strong>trench coats</strong></a> and a bit of sparkle ready for the <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/christmas/"><strong>festive season</strong></a> too, this is what everyone&rsquo;s buying for autumn right now&hellip;</p> <p><strong>SHOP: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/news/20210825120392/best-floral-dresses-we-love/">Best floral dresses for your autumn wardrobe refresh</a></strong></p> <p><img alt="puffa-ebay" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/news/20210925122279/ebay-trending-fashion-for-autumn/0-595-734/puffa-ebay-z.jpg" title="puffa-ebay" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Jack Wills Puffa Jacket, RRP &pound;99.99, NOW &pound;49.99, <a class="aff_text" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fitm%2F363211513102%3Fmkcid%3D1%26amp%3Bmkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26amp%3Bsiteid%3D3%26amp%3Bcampid%3D5338837817%26amp%3Btoolid%3D20008%26amp%3Bmkevt%3D1" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="puffa">eBay Brand Outlet</a></strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fitm%2F363211513102%3Fmkcid%3D1%26amp%3Bmkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26amp%3Bsiteid%3D3%26amp%3Bcampid%3D5338837817%26amp%3Btoolid%3D20008%26amp%3Bmkevt%3D1" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="ebay"><strong>SHOP NOW</strong></a></h6> <p>Quilted and puffa jackets are a must for winter, plus they&#39;re on-trend this year too - the AW trend is bigger than ever this year. Jack Wills&#39; padded design is slimline enough to not be bulky but provides plenty of warmth (and is water-resistant too!)</p> <p><img alt="trench" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/news/20210925122279/ebay-trending-fashion-for-autumn/0-590-390/trench-z.jpg" title="trench" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Jack Wills trench coat, RRP &pound;149.99, NOW &pound;105, <a class="aff_text" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fitm%2F363211511315%3Fmkcid%3D1%26amp%3Bmkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26amp%3Bsiteid%3D3%26amp%3Bcampid%3D5338837817%26amp%3Btoolid%3D20008%26amp%3Bmkevt%3D1" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="trench coat">eBay Brand Outlet</a></strong></p> <p style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fitm%2F363211511315%3Fmkcid%3D1%26amp%3Bmkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26amp%3Bsiteid%3D3%26amp%3Bcampid%3D5338837817%26amp%3Btoolid%3D20008%26amp%3Bmkevt%3D1" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="trench coat"><strong>SHOP NOW</strong></a></p> <p>Everyone &ndash; and we mean everyone &ndash; needs a trench coat in their AW wardrobe. Go for a classic, double-breasted fit and it&rsquo;ll see you through the seasons. This Jack Wills&rsquo; trench coat is a great affordable buy, and available in camel and navy.</p> <p><img alt="whistles-jumper" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/news/20210925122279/ebay-trending-fashion-for-autumn/0-590-391/whistles-jumper-z.jpg" title="whistles-jumper" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Whistles stripe jumper, RRP &pound;125, NOW &pound;28.45, <a class="aff_text" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fitm%2F363251456121%3Fmkcid%3D1%26amp%3Bmkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26amp%3Bsiteid%3D3%26amp%3Bcampid%3D5338837817%26amp%3Btoolid%3D20008%26amp%3Bmkevt%3D1" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="whistles jumper">eBay Brand Outlet</a> </strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fitm%2F363251456121%3Fmkcid%3D1%26amp%3Bmkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26amp%3Bsiteid%3D3%26amp%3Bcampid%3D5338837817%26amp%3Btoolid%3D20008%26amp%3Bmkevt%3D1" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="whistles jumper"><strong>SHOP NOW</strong></a></h6> <p>Stripes have become a stalwart of our style, and we love this cosy Whistles jumper for a colourful take on the Breton trend. Available in sizes small to large, wear with mom jeans or leather trousers.</p> <p><strong>MORE: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/news/2020082796101/shop-best-trench-coats/">Shop the best trench coats for a royal-inspired look</a></strong></p> <p><img alt="sparkle-jumper" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/news/20210925122279/ebay-trending-fashion-for-autumn/0-590-384/sparkle-jumper-z.jpg" title="sparkle-jumper" /></p> <p href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fitm%2F363155859915%3Fmkcid%3D1%26amp%3Bmkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26amp%3Bsiteid%3D3%26amp%3Bcampid%3D5338837817%26amp%3Btoolid%3D20008%26amp%3Bmkevt%3D1" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="sparkle knit">eBay Brand Outlet</a> </strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fitm%2F363155859915%3Fmkcid%3D1%26amp%3Bmkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26amp%3Bsiteid%3D3%26amp%3Bcampid%3D5338837817%26amp%3Btoolid%3D20008%26amp%3Bmkevt%3D1" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="sparkle knit"><strong>SHOP NOW</strong></a></h6> <p>And since we&rsquo;re about to get into the season of sparkle, keen shoppers are already stocking up on their Christmas jumpers &ndash; try this Phase Eight knit for a stylish alternative.</p> <p><img alt="floral-dress" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/news/20210925122279/ebay-trending-fashion-for-autumn/0-590-387/floral-dress-z.jpg" title="floral-dress" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Crew Clothing floral wrap dress, RRP &pound;69, NOW &pound;27, <a class="aff_text" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fitm%2F194291882648%3Fmkcid%3D1%26amp%3Bmkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26amp%3Bsiteid%3D3%26amp%3Bcampid%3D5338837817%26amp%3Btoolid%3D20008%26amp%3Bmkevt%3D1" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="floral dress">eBay Brand Outlet </a></strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fitm%2F194291882648%3Fmkcid%3D1%26amp%3Bmkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26amp%3Bsiteid%3D3%26amp%3Bcampid%3D5338837817%26amp%3Btoolid%3D20008%26amp%3Bmkevt%3D1" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="floral dress"><strong>SHOP NOW</strong></a></h6> <p>Floral dresses and autumn would definitely match on Tinder &ndash; add a pair of knee-high leather boots to this blue midi dress.</p> <p><img alt="chunky-boots" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/news/20210925122279/ebay-trending-fashion-for-autumn/0-595-741/chunky-boots-z.jpg" title="chunky-boots" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Office chunky boots, RRP &pound;89, NOW &pound;45, <a class="aff_text" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fitm%2F304082074900%3Fmkcid%3D1%26amp%3Bmkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26amp%3Bsiteid%3D3%26amp%3Bcampid%3D5338837817%26amp%3Btoolid%3D20008%26amp%3Bmkevt%3D1" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="brogue boots">eBay Brand Outlet</a> </strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fitm%2F304082074900%3Fmkcid%3D1%26amp%3Bmkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26amp%3Bsiteid%3D3%26amp%3Bcampid%3D5338837817%26amp%3Btoolid%3D20008%26amp%3Bmkevt%3D1" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="brogue boots"><strong>SHOP NOW</strong></a></h6> <p>Chunky boots are trending again for autumn, and this minimalistic&nbsp;pair are the ideal mix of smart and casual.</p> <p><img alt="lk-bennett-boots" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/news/20210925122279/ebay-trending-fashion-for-autumn/0-590-392/lk-bennett-boots-z.jpg" title="lk-bennett-boots" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>LK Bennett suede shearling knee high boots, RRP &pound;395, NOW &pound;149, <a class="aff_text" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fitm%2F384189779446%3Fmkcid%3D1%26amp%3Bmkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26amp%3Bsiteid%3D3%26amp%3Bcampid%3D5338837817%26amp%3Btoolid%3D20008%26amp%3Bmkevt%3D1" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="lk bennett boots">eBay Brand Outlet</a> </strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fitm%2F384189779446%3Fmkcid%3D1%26amp%3Bmkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26amp%3Bsiteid%3D3%26amp%3Bcampid%3D5338837817%26amp%3Btoolid%3D20008%26amp%3Bmkevt%3D1" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="lk bennett"><strong>SHOP NOW&nbsp;</strong></a></h6> <p>Knee high boots are loved by celebrities and royals, as they&rsquo;re so easy to wear &ndash; try this LK Bennett pair, with suede and shearling details and a wedge heel. Very Kate Middleton.</p> <p><strong>MORE: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/hfm/20201122101176/best-knitted-dresses-and-how-to-wear-them/">17 knitted dresses that are cosy, comfortable but chic!</a></strong></p> <p><img alt="river-island-dress" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/news/20210925122279/ebay-trending-fashion-for-autumn/0-590-395/river-island-dress-z.jpg" title="river-island-dress" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>River Island sequin jumper dress, RRP &pound;45.60, NOW &pound;38, <a class="aff_text" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fitm%2F402810240103%3Fmkcid%3D1%26amp%3Bmkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26amp%3Bsiteid%3D3%26amp%3Bcampid%3D5338837817%26amp%3Btoolid%3D20008%26amp%3Bmkevt%3D1" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="RI dress">eBay Brand Outlet</a> </strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fitm%2F402810240103%3Fmkcid%3D1%26amp%3Bmkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26amp%3Bsiteid%3D3%26amp%3Bcampid%3D5338837817%26amp%3Btoolid%3D20008%26amp%3Bmkevt%3D1" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="ri dress"><strong>SHOP NOW</strong></a></h6> <p>It&rsquo;s never too early to think of our festive wardrobe and it&rsquo;s easy to see why this River Island knitted dress is trending. We love the mix of plain top and sparkly skirt. If sparkles aren&rsquo;t for you, try this <a class="aff_text" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fitm%2F402810240104%3Fhash%3Ditem5dc95c7c68%3Ag%3AR5QAAOSw0TNghp9H%26amp%3B_trksid%3Dp5731.m3795%26amp%3Bmkcid%3D1%26amp%3Bmkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26amp%3Bsiteid%3D3%26amp%3Bcampid%3D5338837817%26amp%3Btoolid%3D20008%26amp%3Bmkevt%3D1" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="ri dress"><strong>satin skirt version</strong></a>.</p> <p><img alt="whistles-red-dress" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/news/20210925122279/ebay-trending-fashion-for-autumn/0-590-383/whistles-red-dress-z.jpg" title="whistles-red-dress" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Whistles smocked shirt dress, RRP &pound;159, NOW &pound;35.95, <a class="aff_text" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fitm%2F313350500084%3Fmkcid%3D1%26amp%3Bmkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26amp%3Bsiteid%3D3%26amp%3Bcampid%3D5338837817%26amp%3Btoolid%3D20008%26amp%3Bmkevt%3D1" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="whistles dress">eBay Brand Outlet</a> </strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fitm%2F313350500084%3Fmkcid%3D1%26amp%3Bmkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26amp%3Bsiteid%3D3%26amp%3Bcampid%3D5338837817%26amp%3Btoolid%3D20008%26amp%3Bmkevt%3D1" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="whistles dress"><strong>SHOP NOW</strong></a></h6> <p>Or go for a Christmassy-red dress to see you through the festive season. We could see Holly Willoughby in this stunning Whistles shirt dress.</p> <p><img alt="ob-jumpsuit" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/news/20210925122279/ebay-trending-fashion-for-autumn/0-590-405/ob-jumpsuit-z.jpg" title="ob-jumpsuit" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Oliver Bonas utility jumpsuit, RRP &pound;85, NOW &pound;60, <a class="aff_text" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fitm%2F194269951510%3Fmkcid%3D1%26amp%3Bmkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26amp%3Bsiteid%3D3%26amp%3Bcampid%3D5338837817%26amp%3Btoolid%3D20008%26amp%3Bmkevt%3D1" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="ob jumpsuit">eBay Brand Outlet</a> </strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fitm%2F194269951510%3Fmkcid%3D1%26amp%3Bmkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26amp%3Bsiteid%3D3%26amp%3Bcampid%3D5338837817%26amp%3Btoolid%3D20008%26amp%3Bmkevt%3D1" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="ob jumpsuit"><strong>SHOP NOW</strong></a></h6> <p>Boiler suits are having a moment &ndash; try this Oliver Bonas utility jumpsuit, in an autumnal khaki hue for those days when jeans just won&rsquo;t cut it.</p> <p><img alt="river-island-bra-cardi" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/news/20210925122279/ebay-trending-fashion-for-autumn/0-590-382/river-island-bra-cardi-z.jpg" title="river-island-bra-cardi" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>River Island knitted cardigan and bralet, RRP &pound;45, NOW &pound;25, <a class="aff_text" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fitm%2F402791027352%3Fmkcid%3D1%26amp%3Bmkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26amp%3Bsiteid%3D3%26amp%3Bcampid%3D5338837817%26amp%3Btoolid%3D20008%26amp%3Bmkevt%3D1" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="ri cardi">eBay Brand Outlet</a></strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fitm%2F402791027352%3Fmkcid%3D1%26amp%3Bmkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26amp%3Bsiteid%3D3%26amp%3Bcampid%3D5338837817%26amp%3Btoolid%3D20008%26amp%3Bmkevt%3D1" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="ri cardi"><strong>SHOP NOW</strong></a></h6> <p>An alternative to a bulky jumper, River Island&rsquo;s knitted bralet and cardigan set comes in the cutest pastel blue. Shows a little skin while being cosy too.</p> <p><strong>MORE: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/news/20210819119936/best-ebay-womens-trainers-brands/">We found Kate Middleton&#39;s favourite Superga trainers for less on eBay</a></strong></p> <p>&nbsp;</p> <p style="font-size:12px"><em>HELLO!&#39;s selection is editorial and independently chosen &ndash; we only feature items our editors love and approve of. HELLO! may collect a share of sales or other compensation from the links on this page. To find out more visit our </em><a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/news/2019061174038/reader-information-on-affiliate-links/">FAQ page</a>.</p>
item.dc:creator: Carla Challis

item.title: Meghan Markleâs Max Mara camel coat from her New York trip is top of our wish lists
item.description: <p>In September,&nbsp;<a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/meghan-markle/"><strong>Meghan Markle</strong></a> and <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/prince-harry/"><strong>Prince Harry</strong></a> made their first major public in-person appearance since moving stateside in March 2020. The Duke and Duchess of Sussex were in New York to attend Global Citizen Live, where they urged&nbsp;leaders to adopt a vaccine equity policy to help end the Covid-19 pandemic.</p> <p><strong>RELATED:&nbsp;<a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/royal-style/20210923122398/meghan-markle-steps-out-in-all-black-ensemble/">Meghan Markle twins with Prince Harry in smart ensemble for poignant New York visit</a></strong></p> <p><strong>MORE:&nbsp;<a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/royal-style/20210921122205/meghan-markles-first-famous-royal-handbag-strathberry-buy/">Meghan Markle&#39;s first famous royal handbag is finally available to buy</a></strong></p> <p>Meeting with New York Mayor Bill de Blasio and his family for a visit to the One World Observatory in Manhattan, the Duchess of Sussex wore a very chic all-navy ensemble, but it was her next outfit that really caught our eye.</p> <p>Stepping out for a meeting with the U.S. ambassador to the United Nations, Meghan teamed a gorgeous Max Mara camel coat with a black dress by The Row, black Maison Valentino sunglasses and Giorgio Armani heels.</p> <p><img alt="Meghan-Markle-max-mara-coat" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/royal-style/20210924122475/meghan-markle-camel-coat-max-mara-new-york-visit/0-591-709/meghan-markle-max-mara-coat-z.jpg" title="Meghan-Markle-max-mara-coat" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Meghan Markle wears Max Mara in New York</strong></p> <p>Max Mara is renowned for luxury camel coats and Meghan is a big fan of the style, so it&#39;s a sartorial match made in heaven. Her exact Rispoli coat is no longer available, but you can shop the almost identical Manuela coat at Matches Fashion.</p> <p><img alt="Max-Mara-camel-coat" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/royal-style/20210924122475/meghan-markle-camel-coat-max-mara-new-york-visit/0-592-800/max-mara-camel-coat-z.jpg" title="Max-Mara-camel-coat" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Max Mara Manuela coat, &pound;1,580/$2,950, <a class="aff_text" href="https://geni.us/max-mara-coat" rel="sponsored" title="Meghan Markle coat">Matches Fashion</a></strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://geni.us/max-mara-coat" rel="sponsored" title="Meghan Markle coat">SHOP NOW</a></h6> <p>Reiss, another label favoured by the Duchess, also has a beautiful wool-blend longline belted coat which could easily be mistaken for the Italian fashion house. It retails at &pound;328 and is the perfect addition to your workwear wardrobe.</p> <p><img alt="Reiss-camel-coat" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/royal-style/20210924122475/meghan-markle-camel-coat-max-mara-new-york-visit/0-591-696/reiss-camel-coat-z.jpg" title="Reiss-camel-coat" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Brooks wool-blend overcoat, &pound;328/$595, <a class="aff_text" href="https://geni.us/reiss-camel-coat" rel="sponsored" title="Meghan Markle coat">Reiss</a></strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://geni.us/reiss-camel-coat" rel="sponsored" title="Meghan Markle coat">SHOP NOW</a></h6> <p>Mango has a similar wool-blend camel coat too, for just &pound;139.99. The maxi style looks so cosy and&nbsp;will last you season after season.</p> <p><img alt="Mango-camel-coat" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/royal-style/20210924122475/meghan-markle-camel-coat-max-mara-new-york-visit/0-591-684/mango-camel-coat-z.jpg" title="Mango-camel-coat" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Wool-blend coat, &pound;139.99/$160.99, <a class="aff_text" href="https://geni.us/mango-camel-coat" rel="sponsored" title="Meghan Markle coat">Mango</a></strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://geni.us/mango-camel-coat" rel="sponsored" title="Meghan Markle coat">SHOP NOW</a></h6> <p>Marks &amp; Spencer has recently added&nbsp;this&nbsp;camel coat to the&nbsp;new-in autumn collection, and it&#39;s fit for a Duchess!&nbsp;</p> <p><img alt="m-s-camel-coat" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/royal-style/20210924122475/meghan-markle-camel-coat-max-mara-new-york-visit/0-595-580/m-s-camel-coat-z.jpg" title="m-s-camel-coat" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Jaeger camel coat, &pound;325/$599, <a class="aff_text" href="https://geni.us/jaeger-camel-coat" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="m&amp;s">Marks &amp; Spencer</a></strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://geni.us/jaeger-camel-coat" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="m&amp;s">SHOP NOW</a></h6> <p>They also have this reversible pure wool wrap coat in&nbsp;camel brown and grey. It features&nbsp;two handy patch pockets on either side.</p> <p><img alt="Jaeger-coat-reversable" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/royal-style/20210924122475/meghan-markle-camel-coat-max-mara-new-york-visit/0-597-43/jaeger-coat-reversable-z.jpg" title="Jaeger-coat-reversable" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Jaeger reversible longline&nbsp;coat, &pound;325/$519, <a class="aff_text" href="https://geni.us/jaeger-reversible-coat" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="m&amp;s">Marks &amp; Spencer</a></strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://geni.us/jaeger-reversible-coat" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="m&amp;s">SHOP NOW</a></h6> <p>While Anine Bing&#39;s Dylan coat has a loose structure with sharp tailoring for&nbsp;an autumn essential that will elevate any outfit.&nbsp;</p> <p><img alt="Anine-Bing-camel-coat" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/royal-style/20210924122475/meghan-markle-camel-coat-max-mara-new-york-visit/0-596-210/anine-bing-camel-coat-z.jpg" title="Anine-Bing-camel-coat" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Dylan coat, &euro;699/$699, <a class="aff_text" href="https://geni.us/anine-bing-camel-coat" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="Anine Bing">Anine Bing</a></strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://geni.us/anine-bing-camel-coat" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="Anine Bing">SHOP NOW</a></h6> <p>On a sunny autumn day, pair your outfit with black Valentino sunglasses like Meghan&#39;s.&nbsp;You can find a&nbsp;pair just likes hers at the Sunglass Hut.</p> <p><img alt="Maison-Valentino-sunglasses" item.title: The White Companyâs advent calendar for 2021 is SO luxurious â and itâs available NOW
item.description: <p><a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/advent-calendars/"><strong>Advent calendars</strong></a> are now SO much more than chocolate, and the one we&rsquo;ve been counting down the days for has finally gone on sale &ndash; <a class="aff_text" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=BEA-U250--&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.thewhitecompany.com%2Fuk%2FBeauty-Advent-Calendar%2Fp%2FADDCA" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="TWC"><strong>The White Company</strong></a>&rsquo;s stunning beauty advent calendar.</p> <p>Bursting with 25 luxurious miniatures, inside the pull-out drawers you&rsquo;ll find a gorgeous mix of The White Company&rsquo;s signature products, from bodycare to candles, in iconic fragrances from the Calm &amp; Spa collection. And the best part? There&rsquo;s even two full-sized candles in festive fragrances&nbsp;for you to enjoy throughout <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/christmas/"><strong>Christmas</strong></a> and beyond.</p> <p><strong>MORE: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/healthandbeauty/20210907121109/best-beauty-advent-calendars-to-buy/">22 best beauty advent calendars you can shop now for Christmas 2021</a></strong></p> <p><img alt="twc-advent-calendar" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/healthandbeauty/20210922122228/the-white-company-advent-calendar/0-590-170/twc-advent-calendar-z.jpg" title="twc-advent-calendar" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong><a class="aff_text" href="https://geni.us/twc-advent-calendar" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="twc">The White Company advent calendar 2021, &pound;160</a><a class="aff_text" href="https://geni.us/twc-advent-calendar" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="twc">/$229</a></strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://geni.us/twc-advent-calendar" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="twc"><strong>SHOP NOW</strong></a></h6> <p>In true <a class="aff_text" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=BEA-U250--&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.thewhitecompany.com%2Fuk%2F" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="TWC"><strong>The White Company</strong></a> style, the advent calendar itself mirrors the brand&rsquo;s cool, minimal aesthetic with the trademark black and white packaging accessorised with a festive silver bow. The advent calendar can be refilled and reused for next year too. It&rsquo;s the gift that keeps on giving!</p> <p>If you want to snap up the advent calendar from The White Company, be quick &ndash; in previous years, it&nbsp;sold out within days. Luckily, it&rsquo;s on sale now (so no waiting lists) at <a class="aff_text" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=BEA-U100--&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.thewhitecompany.com%2Fuk%2F" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="twc"><strong>thewhitecompany.com</strong></a> and in selected stores around the UK too. Worth &pound;254, it&#39;s a great way to explore and enjoy The White Company&#39;s sumptuous products.</p> <p><strong>MORE: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/healthandbeauty/20210922122228/the-white-company-advent-calendar/">Elemis&#39; beauty advent calendar is just the thing for skincare enthusiasts</a></strong></p> <h2><strong>What&rsquo;s inside The White Company&rsquo;s beauty advent calendar 2021?</strong></h2> <p>It&rsquo;s got everything you need for some serious indulgence and more, with minis and full-size products in the 25 drawers &ndash; it&rsquo;s the first time The White Company have included two full-size candles, so you&rsquo;re really in for a treat! Ready for a spoiler? Look away now if you want yours to be a surprise&hellip;</p> <ul> <li><strong>Winter Signature Candle 140g (full-size)</strong></li> <li><strong>Seychelles Handbag Cream 30ml</strong></li> <li><strong>Seychelles Shampoo 50ml</strong></li> <li><strong>Seychelles Conditioner 50ml</strong></li> <li><strong>Lime &amp; Bay Hand Wash 50ml</strong></li> <li><strong>Blanc Body Wash 50ml</strong></li> <li><strong>Blanc Body Lotion 50ml</strong></li> <li><strong>Pomegranate Shower Gel 50ml</strong></li> <li><strong>Pomegranate Body Lotion 50ml</strong></li> <li><strong>Midnight Votive 60g</strong></li> <li><strong>Calm Bath Shot 30ml</strong></li> <li><strong>Calm Body Cream 75ml</strong></li> <li><strong>Mini Wild Mint Hand Wash 50ml</strong></li> <li><strong>Mini Wild Mint Hand Cream 50ml</strong></li> <li><strong>Lime &amp; Bay Hand Cream 30ml</strong></li> <li><strong>Tuberose &amp; Cashmere Shower Gel 50ml</strong></li> <li><strong>Tuberose &amp; Cashmere Body Lotion 50ml</strong></li> <li><strong>Spa Bath Shot 30ml</strong></li> <li><strong>Spa Restore Body Cream 75ml Highland</strong></li> <li><strong>Escape Votive 60g</strong></li> <li><strong>Noir Hand Wash 50ml</strong></li> <li><strong>Noir Hand Lotion 50ml</strong></li> <li><strong>Sleep Hand &amp; Body Balm 75ml</strong></li> <li><strong>Sleep Pulse Point 10ml</strong></li> <li><strong>Fir Tree Signature Candle 140g (full-size)</strong></li> </ul> <p>This is the one for you to indulge with - it&#39;s been a&nbsp;<em>year,&nbsp;</em>you deserve it.</p> <p><strong>MORE: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/hfm/20201113100531/best-gifts-for-women/">40+ Christmas gift ideas for her - get shopping</a></strong></p>
item.dc:creator: Carla Challis

item.title: The Jo Malone Advent Calendar 2021 is here and you will be blown away
item.description: <p>Every year without fail, there&#39;s one <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/advent-calendars/"><strong>beauty advent calendar</strong></a><strong>&nbsp;</strong>at the top of everyone&#39;s wish list - and that&#39;s the offering from <a class="aff_text" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=BEA---210921&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.jomalone.co.uk%2F" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="Jo Malone"><strong>Jo Malone London</strong></a>. Filled with 24 magical miniatures, it&#39;s a mix of&nbsp;fragrances and products for the home as well as your bathroom, to make your December even more exciting.</p> <p><meta charset="utf-8" />The stunning advent calendar comes in the trademark Jo Malone&nbsp;yellow and gold packaging which can&nbsp;be refilled and reused.&nbsp;It&#39;s enough to make anyone swoon.&nbsp;</p> <p><strong>RELATED:&nbsp;<a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/healthandbeauty/20210907121109/best-beauty-advent-calendars-to-buy/">29&nbsp;best beauty advent calendars you can shop now for Christmas 2021</a>&nbsp;</strong></p> <p>If you want to get your hands on one, it&#39;s now available exclusively&nbsp;at&nbsp;<a class="aff_text" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=BEA-U500--300921&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.jomalone.co.uk%2Fproduct%2F26322%2F90191%2Fgift-sets%2Fadvent-calendar%3Fsize%3DOne_Size" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="Jo Malone"><strong>jomalone.co.uk</strong></a>&nbsp;and will drop&nbsp;in Jo Malone London stores on 18 October. item.title: The John Lewis Beauty Advent Calendar for 2021 is mood boosting & worth over Â£600
item.description: <p dir="ltr"><a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/john-lewis/"><strong>John Lewis</strong></a>, take all our money! The 2021&nbsp;<strong>beauty <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/advent-calendars/">advent calendar</a></strong>&nbsp;is finally available to buy&nbsp;and it&#39;s a fabulous bright pop of&nbsp;colour this year - just what we all need after a sombre time of late. The calendar retails at &pound;159, containing over &pound;600 worth of beauty must-haves from the nation&#39;s favourite beauty brands including <strong>Augustinus Bader, Dr. Jart+, Sunday Riley, Neom, CharlotteTilbury, The Beauty Chef, Elemis, Hourglass,&nbsp;Estee Lauder</strong> and lots more.<strong>&nbsp;</strong></p> <p dir="ltr"><strong>RELATED: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/healthandbeauty/20210907121109/best-beauty-advent-calendars-to-buy/">The best beauty advent calendars to get you excited for Christmas</a></strong></p> <p><img alt="john-lewis-advent-calendar-2021" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/healthandbeauty/makeup/20210917121929/john-lewis-beauty-advent-calendar/0-588-880/john-lewis-advent-calendar-2021-z.jpg" title="john-lewis-advent-calendar-2021" /></p> <p dir="ltr" style="text-align:center"><strong>John Lewis beauty advent calendar, &pound;159, <a class="aff_text" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=BEA-U250&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.johnlewis.com%2Fjohn-lewis-partners-beauty-advent-calendar%2Fp5743561" rel="sponsored" title="john lewis">John Lewis</a></strong></p> <h6 dir="ltr" style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=BEA-U250&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.johnlewis.com%2Fjohn-lewis-partners-beauty-advent-calendar%2Fp5743561" rel="sponsored" title="john lewis advent">SHOP NOW</a></h6> <p dir="ltr">Inside there are 12 full-size products and the calendar has been designed to offer customers a number of beauty rituals including a full skincare regime, a versatile makeup look, a moment of calm, some finishing touches for the hair and the John Lewis beauty buyers&rsquo;&nbsp;favourite finds.</p> <p dir="ltr"><strong>RELATED: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/healthandbeauty/2020090896814/best-mens-advent-calendars-2020/">Our favourite men&#39;s advent calendars to get him in the festive spirit this year</a></strong></p> <p dir="ltr">What&#39;s more, sustainability has been front of mind when designing this year&#39;s calendar and the carefully curated selection is housed in a<strong> fully recyclable box</strong> with reversible drawers for those that want reuse and fill up next year.&nbsp;Customers can also recycle all their beauty advent empties, using the <strong>John Lewis in-store BeautyCycle service</strong>, to recycle five or more beauty empties and enjoy &pound;5 off your next beauty purchase. FYI, customers need to be a My John Lewis member to do this.</p> <p dir="ltr"><strong>SHOP: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/healthandbeauty/mother-and-baby/2020090796729/best-advent-calendars-for-kids/">J</a><a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/healthandbeauty/mother-and-baby/20210923122318/john-lewis-anyday-range-kids-collection/">ohn Lewis just dropped the coolest kids clothes for Autumn - and they&#39;re under &pound;20</a></strong></p> <p dir="ltr">The calendar officially launched&nbsp;on <strong>4&nbsp;October 2021</strong>, and it will definitely sell out because it ALWAYS does.</p> <h2 dir="ltr"><strong>What&#39;s inside the John Lewis Beauty Advent Calendar 2021?</strong></h2> <p dir="ltr"><em>Spoiler alert: The contents revealed below</em></p> <ul dir="ltr"> <li><strong>Kate Somerville Exfolikate Cleanser 50ml</strong></li> <li><strong>Ren Ready Steady Glow 100ml</strong></li> <li><strong>Augustinus Bader Vegan Reformed Rich Cream 15ml</strong></li> <li><strong>Sunday Riley Good Genes 15ml</strong></li> <li><strong>Dr. Jart+ Ceramidin Face mask</strong></li> <li><strong>Evolve Rose Quartz Exfoliator 30ml</strong></li> <li><strong>Estee Lauder Advanced Night Repair 30ml</strong></li> <li><strong>Liz Earle Skin Tonic 50ml</strong></li> <li><strong>Elemis Superfood Kefir Face Mist 30ml</strong></li> <li><strong>Dermalogica Bio-C serum 30ml</strong></li> <li><strong>Clinique Dramatically Different 15m</strong></li> <li><strong>Fresh Soy Face Cleanser 50ml</strong></li> <li><strong>MAC Lipstick&nbsp;</strong></li> <li><strong>Hourglass Caution Mascara&nbsp;</strong></li> <li><strong>Charlotte Tilbury Queen of Glow Palette&nbsp;</strong></li> <li><strong>Nars Lip Pencil</strong></li> <li><strong>Laura Mercier Caviar Stick&nbsp;</strong></li> <li><strong>This Works Deep Sleep Pillow Spray 35ml</strong></li> <li><strong>Aromatherapy Associates De-Stress Muscle Bath &amp; Shower Oil 55ml</strong></li> <li><strong>Molton Brown Fiery Pink Pepper Bath &amp; Shower Gel 100ml</strong></li> <li><strong>Neom Organics London Real Luxury Standard Scented Candle&nbsp;</strong></li> <li><strong>Living Proof PHD Dry Shampoo 92ml</strong></li> <li><strong>The Beauty Chef Collagen Inner Boost 100ml</strong></li> <li><strong>Floral Street Arizona Bloom 10ml</strong></li> <li><strong>Juliette Has a Gun Fragrance&nbsp; X2 5mls&nbsp;</strong></li> <li><strong>Hermes L&rsquo;Ombre des Merveilles 7.5ml</strong></li> </ul> <p style="font-size:12px"><em>HELLO!&#39;s selection is editorial and independently chosen &ndash; item.dc:creator: Leanne Bayley

item.title: 39 easy Halloween costume ideas for women: From fallen angels to Kim Kardashian at the Met Gala
item.description: <p>When it comes to choosing a <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/halloween/"><strong>Halloween</strong></a> costume, you probably sit firmly in one of two camps,&nbsp;funny or sexy, with a bit of scary thrown in. Either way, most of us have&n bsp;attempted a homemade costume with tragic results (guilty), so we&#39;ve searched the internet to find all of the best costumes and accessories you can shop online for an outfit you&#39;ll love that requires minimal effort.</p> <p>Last year Halloween fell during&nbsp;lockdowns,&nbsp;so don&#39;t miss out this&nbsp;time. Here are the best easy&nbsp;Halloween costume ideas&nbsp;for adults to shop in 2021...</p> <p><strong>RELATED:&nbsp;<a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/healthandbeauty/mother-and-baby/2020101599135/best-kids-halloween-costumes/">14 best Halloween costumes for kids &ndash; get your little monsters sorted</a></strong></p> <p><strong>MORE: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/news/20211006123209/halloween-pyjamas-for-women/">These Halloween pyjamas are perfect for a cosy night in</a></strong></p> <h3>Halloween angel costumes</h3> <p>Adding angel wings and a halo to that little white dress you&#39;ve been wanting to wear is&nbsp;an easy and cute Halloween costume. Or let Amazon do all of the hard work for you with one of their angel costumes, complete with a dress and accessories. To make it more Halloween-appropriate, go as a fallen angel in black.</p> <p><img alt="Angel-halo-boohoo" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/news/20210917121676/halloween-costumes-for-adults/0-599-995/angel-halo-boohoo-z.jpg" title="Angel-halo-boohoo" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Faux feather halo, &pound;4.80/$4.80, <a class="aff_text" href="https://geni.us/boohoo-halo" rel="sponsored" title="Halloween costume">Boohoo</a></strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://geni.us/boohoo-halo" rel="sponsored" title="Halloween costume">SHOP NOW</a></h6> <p><img alt="Angel-wings-pretty-little-thing" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/news/20210917121676/halloween-costumes-for-adults/0-587-594/angel-wings-pretty-little-thing-z.jpg" title="Angel-wings-pretty-little-thing" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Extra large feather angel wings, &pound;30/$58, <a class="aff_text" href="https://geni.us/PLT-white-wings" rel="sponsored" title="Halloween costume">Pretty Little Thing</a></strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://geni.us/PLT-white-wings" rel="sponsored" title="Halloween costume">SHOP NOW</a></h6> <p><img alt="Amazon-angel-wings" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/news/20210917121676/halloween-costumes-for-adults/0-587-607/amazon-angel-wings-z.jpg" title="Amazon-angel-wings" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Boland angel wings, &pound;9.79/$16.11, <a class="aff_text" href="https://geni.us/angel-wings" rel="sponsored" title="Halloween costume">Amazon</a></strong></p> <h6 <h3>Halloween devil costumes</h3> <p>A devil costume can be sexy and scary, plus it&#39;s a great excuse to wear&nbsp;a bold red lip. If you want to go low-key you can just wear a pair of horns, or you could go all out with a red outfit complete with a cape.</p> <p><img alt="Devil-horns-asos" Fake blood is essential.</p> <p><img alt="vampire-costume-fancydress"
