item.title: Millie Mackintosh looks stunning as she steps out in one of Kate Middletonâs favourite affordable brands
item.description: <p><a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/millie-mackintosh/"><strong>Millie Mackintosh</strong></a> looked stunning in a pink midi dress as she attended the <a class="aff_text" href="http://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=CLT---030921&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.boden.co.uk%2Fen-gb" rel="sponsored" title="Boden"><strong>Boden</strong></a> Turns 30 event at Carousel in London on Thursday.</p> <p><strong>RELATED:&nbsp;<a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/royal-style/20210901120779/kate-middleton-purple-dress-lookalike/">Kate Middleton would love this River Island dress - it&rsquo;s perfect for a royal wardrobe</a></strong></p> <p><strong>MORE:&nbsp;<a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/news/20210817119771/boden-floral-maxi-dress-best-reviews/">This floral designer-inspired maxi dress is trending right now - and yes - it has pockets</a></strong></p> <p>The mum-of-one, who is currently expecting her second baby, paired the gorgeous bohemian silk midi with nude heels from Maxine shoes, a pink tassled Rosantica bag and a pair of celestial earrings by Soru jewellery. Joined by the likes of Jodie Kidd and Amber Le Bon, they celebrated 30 years since Boden first launched.</p> <p><img alt="Millie-Mackintosh-Boden" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/news/20210903120953/millie-mackintosh-floral-dress-boden-pregnancy-style/0-584-417/millie-mackintosh-boden-z.jpg" title="Millie-Mackintosh-Boden" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Pregnant Millie Mackintosh was glowing in her Boden dress</strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=CLT---060921&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.boden.co.uk%2Fen-gb%2Fthirtieth-birthday-collection%3Fintid%3DD09_WW_30thBirthdayEditorial_CB1_CTA" rel="sponsored" title="Boden">SHOP THE BODEN ANNIVERSARY COLLECTION</a></h6> <p>Despite its affordable price point, the much-loved British high street brand is even <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/millie-mackintosh/"><strong>Kate Middleton</strong></a>-approved, as the royal has been seen out wearing several Boden pieces. <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/royal-style/20210308108405/kate-middleton-international-womens-day-outfit-boden-blouse/"><strong>Kate wore a pink Boden blouse on International Women&#39;s Day 2021</strong></a> and was also <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/royal-style/20210311108671/kate-middleton-first-royal-engagement-following-oprah-interview/"><strong>pictured in a Boden jumper at a school visit</strong></a> earlier this year. We even <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/royal-style/20210528114173/kate-middleton-boden-belt/"><strong>spotted her wearing a Boden belt</strong></a> at a royal engagement recently.</p> <p>Millie&#39;s &#39;Miriam&#39; dress is part of <a class="aff_text" href="http://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=CLT---060921&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.boden.co.uk%2Fen-gb%2Fthirtieth-birthday-collection%3Fintid%3DD09_WW_30thBirthdayEditorial_CB1_CTA" rel="sponsored" title="Boden collection"><strong>Boden&#39;s celebratory anniversary collection</strong></a>, which is now available to shop online. As well as Millie&#39;s dress, the edit also includes classic Breton tops, stylish midi skirts, argyle tank tops and even a luxe velvet co-ord.</p> <p><img alt="Miriam-dress-boden" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/news/20210903120953/millie-mackintosh-floral-dress-boden-pregnancy-style/0-584-799/miriam-dress-boden-z.jpg" title="Miriam-dress-boden" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Miriam dress, &pound;240, <a class="aff_text" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=CLT-U250-OMP-060921&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.boden.co.uk%2Fen-gb%2Fmariam-dress-old-rose-intricate-tapestry%2Fsty-d0011-pnk%3Fcat%3DC1_S6_G2291" rel="sponsored" title="Boden dress">Boden</a></strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=CLT-U250-OMP-060921&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.boden.co.uk%2Fen-gb%2Fmariam-dress-old-rose-intricate-tapestry%2Fsty-d0011-pnk%3Fcat%3DC1_S6_G2291" rel="sponsored" title="Boden dress">SHOP NOW</a></h6> <p>We wouldn&#39;t be surprised to see the Duchess of Cambridge wearing something from the edit on one of her next royal outings. In fact, the Miriam dress is just her style. So this is one collection you don&#39;t want to miss.</p> <p><strong>MORE:&nbsp;<a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/news/20210825120392/best-floral-dresses-we-love/">Best floral dresses for your autumn wardrobe refresh</a></strong></p> <p style="font-size:12px"><em>HELLO!&#39;s selection is editorial and independently chosen &ndash; we only feature items our editors love and approve of. HELLO! may collect a share of sales or other compensation from the links on this page. To find out more visit our </em><a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/news/2019061174038/reader-information-on-affiliate-links/">FAQ page</a>.</p>
item.dc:creator: Hollie Brotherton

item.title: The homeware brands you can find on eBay - but sshhh donât tell anyone
item.description: <p>If Changing Rooms has got you inspired to give your <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/homes/"><strong>home</strong></a> a makeover, let us introduce you to the online homeware shop you&rsquo;re about to be obsessed with &ndash; <a class="aff_text" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fb%2FHome-and-Garden-Outlet%2Fbn_7117584313%3Fmkcid%3D1%26amp%3Bmkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26amp%3Bsiteid%3D3%26amp%3Bcampid%3D5338832726%26amp%3Btoolid%3D20008%26amp%3Bmkevt%3D1" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="home outlet"><strong>eBay Home Outlet</strong></a>, a hub of the best homeware brands with <strong>up to 30% off</strong>.</p> <p>Yep, get your Pinterest board ready, because browsing the <a class="aff_text" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fb%2FHome-and-Garden-Outlet%2Fbn_7117584313%3Fmkcid%3D1%26amp%3Bmkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26amp%3Bsiteid%3D3%26amp%3Bcampid%3D5338832726%26amp%3Btoolid%3D20008%26amp%3Bmkevt%3D1" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="ebay home"><strong>Home Outlet</strong></a> is nothing short of home inspo. Think affordable velvet armchairs from MADE, home accessories from The White Company, Emma memory foam mattresses, Brabantia <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/kitchen/"><strong>kitchen</strong></a> bins - the list goes on.</p> <p><strong>SHOP: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/homes/20210728118192/bright-home-accessories-decor-ideas/">23 bright home accessories and decor ideas for a happy home</a></strong></p> <p>Get shopping the 7 high street homeware brands we never knew were on eBay&hellip;</p> <h2><strong>Emma mattress</strong></h2> <p>The UK&rsquo;s most awarded mattress brand is dubbed as giving &ldquo;an unbeatable night&rsquo;s sleep&rdquo;. Yes please!</p> <p><img alt="emma-mattress" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/homes/20210901120727/ebay-home-outlet-brands-to-know/0-583-414/emma-mattress-z.jpg" title="emma-mattress" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Emma Original Renewed Memory Foam Mattress, RRP &pound;262.25, NOW &pound;309, <a class="aff_text" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fitm%2F144102333684%3Fmkcid%3D1%26amp%3Bmkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26amp%3Bsiteid%3D3%26amp%3Bcampid%3D5338832726%26amp%3Btoolid%3D20008%26amp%3Bmkevt%3D1" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="emma mattress">eBay Home Outlet</a></strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fe%2Fhome-garden%2Fhome-outlet-emma%3Fmkcid%3D1%26amp%3Bmkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26amp%3Bsiteid%3D3%26amp%3Bcampid%3D5338832726%26amp%3Btoolid%3D20008%26amp%3Bmkevt%3D1" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="emma outlet"><strong>SHOP EMMA OUTLET NOW</strong></a></h6> <p>The Emma Memory Foam mattress is one of the most popular from the brand, and is designed to give your body the perfect support. It has a temperature regulating top cover, and a layer to keep your spine evenly aligned, whatever your sleeping position.</p> <p><strong>MORE: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/homes/2020052790431/best-mattress-to-buy-top-reviews/">20 of the best mattresses to buy right now for the best night&#39;s sleep of your life</a></strong></p> <h2><strong>Brabantia</strong></h2> <p>Known for its stylish yet practical kitchen gadgets and essentials, Brabantia&rsquo;s kitchen bins are on constant bestseller lists.</p> <p><img alt="branbantia-bin" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/homes/20210901120727/ebay-home-outlet-brands-to-know/0-583-419/branbantia-bin-z.jpg" title="branbantia-bin" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Brabantia Touch Bin, &pound;146, <a class="aff_text" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fitm%2F264444505566%3Fmkcid%3D1%26amp%3Bmkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26amp%3Bsiteid%3D3%26amp%3Bcampid%3D5338832726%26amp%3Btoolid%3D20008%26amp%3Bmkevt%3D1" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="bin">eBay Home Outlet</a></strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fe%2Fhome-garden%2Fhome-outlet-brabantia%3Fmkcid%3D1%26amp%3Bmkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26amp%3Bsiteid%3D3%26amp%3Bcampid%3D5338832726%26amp%3Btoolid%3D20008%26amp%3Bmkevt%3D1" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="brabantia"><strong>SHOP BRABANTIA OUTLET</strong></a></h6> <p>Featuring a soft-touch lid and flat rear shape, Branbantia&rsquo;s 40L bin is available in white, matte black and matt steel.</p> <h2><strong>The White Company</strong></h2> <p>The White Company might be known for its deliciously-scented candles and cosy cashmere, but it&rsquo;s their homeware that gets our attention &ndash; think minimalist pieces in soft, luxe tones.</p> <p><img alt="TWC-xmas-tree" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/homes/20210901120727/ebay-home-outlet-brands-to-know/0-590-889/twc-xmas-tree-z.jpg" title="TWC-xmas-tree" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>The White Company Grand Spruce 6ft pre-lit artificial Christmas tree, RRP &pound;199, NOW &pound;164.99, <a class="aff_text" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fitm%2F393563646124%3Fmkcid%3D1%26amp%3Bmkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26amp%3Bsiteid%3D3%26amp%3Bcampid%3D5338832726%26amp%3Btoolid%3D20008%26amp%3Bmkevt%3D1" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="twc tree">eBay Home Outlet</a>&nbsp;</strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fe%2Fhome-garden%2Fhome-outlet-the-white-company%3Fmkcid%3D1%26amp%3Bmkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26amp%3Bsiteid%3D3%26amp%3Bcampid%3D5338832726%26amp%3Btoolid%3D20008%26amp%3Bmkevt%3D1" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="twc outlet"><strong>SHOP THE WHITE COMPANY OUTLET</strong></a></h6> <p>It&#39;s never too early to think about your festive decorations, and The White Company&#39;s artificial Christmas trees sell out quick. Known for their brilliant quality, this 6ft Grand Spruce is already pre-lit and will last you and your family for years.</p> <h2><strong>La-Z-Boy</strong></h2> <p>Remember when Joey and Chandler in Friends had their reclining leather chairs? That&rsquo;s exactly what La-Z-Boy are known for making &ndash; some of the comfiest reclining armchairs and sofas known to man.</p> <p><img alt="lazboy" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/homes/20210901120727/ebay-home-outlet-brands-to-know/0-583-428/lazboy-z.jpg" title="lazboy" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>La-Z-Boy 2-seater power recliner sofa, &pound;1,299, <a class="aff_text" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fitm%2F284220846766%3Fmkcid%3D1%26amp%3Bmkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26amp%3Bsiteid%3D3%26amp%3Bcampid%3D5338832726%26amp%3Btoolid%3D20008%26amp%3Bmkevt%3D1" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="lazboy">eBay Home Outlet</a></strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fe%2Fhome-garden%2Fhome-outlet-la-z-boy%3Fmkcid%3D1%26amp%3Bmkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26amp%3Bsiteid%3D3%26amp%3Bcampid%3D5338832726%26amp%3Btoolid%3D20008%26amp%3Bmkevt%3D1" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="lazbo"><strong>SHOP LA-Z-BOY OUTLET</strong></a></h6> <p>&nbsp;Park us in front of Netflix with snacks and we&rsquo;d sit on this La-Z-Boy seat all day long.</p> <h2><strong>Cox &amp; Cox</strong></h2> <p>The home of luxe interiors, Cox &amp; Cox is your go-to for the most decadent of sofas, squishy yet stylish armchairs and furniture from desks to dining tables.</p> <p><img alt="cox-console" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/homes/20210901120727/ebay-home-outlet-brands-to-know/0-590-886/cox-console-z.jpg" title="cox-console" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Cox &amp; Cox console&nbsp;desk, RRP &pound;350, NOW &pound;169.99, <a class="aff_text" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fitm%2F154410926707%3Fmkcid%3D1%26amp%3Bmkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26amp%3Bsiteid%3D3%26amp%3Bcampid%3D5338832726%26amp%3Btoolid%3D20008%26amp%3Bmkevt%3D1" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="swoon desk">eBay Home Outlet&nbsp;</a></strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fe%2Fhome-garden%2Fhome-outlet-cox-and-cox%3Fmkcid%3D1%26amp%3Bmkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26amp%3Bsiteid%3D3%26amp%3Bcampid%3D5338832726%26amp%3Btoolid%3D20008%26amp%3Bmkevt%3D1" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="cox and cox outlet"><strong>SHOP COX &amp; COX&nbsp;OUTLET</strong></a></h6> <p>Upgrade your WFH situation with this chic, Scandi-style desk that&#39;s stylish enough to have on display. Can double up as a console table for your hallway too.</p> <p><strong>MORE: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/homes/20210316108985/home-office-decor-inspiration-instagram-photos/">10 real-life home offices on Instagram to inspire your WFH situation</a></strong></p> <h2><strong>Nectar</strong></h2> <p>There&#39;s nothing quite like a dreamy, cloud-like mattress and if you&#39;re looking to invest, Nectar boxed mattresses are considered one of the best.</p> <p><img alt="nectar" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/homes/20210901120727/ebay-home-outlet-brands-to-know/0-583-434/nectar-z.jpg" title="nectar" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Nectar Memory Foam mattress, RRP from &pound;549, NOW from &pound;249.99, <a class="aff_text" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fitm%2F154168489683%3Fmkcid%3D1%26amp%3Bmkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26amp%3Bsiteid%3D3%26amp%3Bcampid%3D5338832726%26amp%3Btoolid%3D20008%26amp%3Bmkevt%3D1" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="nectar">eBay Home Outlet&nbsp;</a></strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fe%2Fhome-garden%2Fhome-outlet-nectar%3Fmkcid%3D1%26amp%3Bmkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26amp%3Bsiteid%3D3%26amp%3Bcampid%3D5338832726%26amp%3Btoolid%3D20008%26amp%3Bmkevt%3D1" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="nectar"><strong>SHOP NECTAR OUTLET</strong></a></h6> <p>Nectar&#39;s bestselling memory foam mattress hugs your body, thanks to the 25cm memory foam foam, and is designed to support the spine and control your temperature. Available in sizes single to super king.</p> <p><strong>MORE: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/hfm/20210316108979/ebay-fashion-outlet-brands-to-know/">10 high street fashion brands you&#39;ll find on eBay - no, we didn&#39;t know either</a></strong></p> <p>&nbsp;</p> <p style="font-size:12px"><em>HELLO!&#39;s selection is editorial and independently chosen &ndash; we only feature items our editors love and approve of. item.title: The Lookfantastic advent calendar 2021 has landed and it's better than ever
item.description: <p>Good news beauty lovers, Lookfantastic&#39;s&nbsp;highly-anticipated 2021 beauty advent calendar has landed and is&nbsp;now&nbsp;<a class="aff_text" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=BEA-U100--310821&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.lookfantastic.com%2Fseasonal%2Fchristmas%2Fadvent-calendar%2Fwait-list.list" rel="sponsored" title="Lookfantastic beauty advent calendar"><strong>available to order online</strong></a>. It&#39;s been one of the biggest hits for the last six years and sold out on pre-orders in 2020, so don&#39;t miss out. As well as including some of our favourite beauty brands like NARS, Elemis, Kate Somerville and Shiseido, it&#39;s also one of the most affordable on the market.</p> <p><strong>RELATED:&nbsp;<a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/healthandbeauty/20210907121109/best-beauty-advent-calendars-to-buy/">31&nbsp;best beauty advent calendars you can shop now for Christmas 2021&nbsp;</a></strong></p> <p><strong>MORE:&nbsp;<a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/healthandbeauty/20210826120452/cult-beauty-advent-calendar-christmas/">The Cult Beauty advent calendar for 2021 is here and this is how you can get hold of it</a></strong></p> <h2>What is the Lookfantastic&nbsp;advent calendar this year?&nbsp;</h2> <p>It&#39;s a 25-piece edit of their best-selling skincare, haircare, bodycare and makeup.</p> <p><img alt="Look-fantastic-advent-calendar" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/healthandbeauty/20210831120712/lookfantastic-beauty-advent-calendar-christmas/0-583-357/look-fantastic-advent-calendar-z.jpg" title="Look-fantastic-advent-calendar" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Beauty Advent Calendar 2021, &pound;85/$115,</strong> <a class="aff_text" href="https://geni.us/lookfantastic-advent" rel="sponsored" title="Lookfantastic beauty advent calendar"><strong>Lookfantastic</strong></a></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://geni.us/lookfantastic-advent" rel="sponsored" title="Lookfantastic beauty advent calendar">SHOP NOW</a></h6> <h2>What&#39;s inside the Lookfantastic&nbsp;advent calendar for 2021?&nbsp;</h2> <p>Inside you&#39;ll find mini versions of some of the beauty industry&#39;s most-loved luxury products, like a NARS Blush in Orgasm, the Kate Somerville Goat Milk Moisturising Cleanser, the Shiseido Ultimune Power Infusing Concentrate and the Philip Kingsley Elasti-Styler. There&#39;s also a full-size ESPA Clean &amp; Green Detox Mask, worth &pound;40 alone.</p> <p><strong>MORE:&nbsp;<a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/healthandbeauty/makeup/20210901120765/benefit-beauty-advent-calendar-christmas/">The Benefit Beauty Advent Calendar for 2021 has dropped and it&#39;s full of cute mini makeup products</a></strong></p> <h2>When does the Lookfantastic&nbsp;advent calendar go on sale?&nbsp;</h2> <p>It&#39;s available to shop now.</p> <h2>How much is the Lookfantastic advent calendar?&nbsp;</h2> <p>This year the Lookfantastic beauty advent calendar is &pound;85, with the products inside worth over &pound;414! Subscribers to the Lookfantastic Beauty Box can also get a further &pound;15 discount.</p> <p><strong>MORE: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/healthandbeauty/skincare-and-fragrances/20210909121154/asos-beauty-advent-calendars-christmas-2021/">Surprise! ASOS drops TWO Beauty Advent Calendars - and you&#39;ll want them both</a></strong></p> <p style="font-size:12px"><em>HELLO!&#39;s selection is editorial and independently chosen &ndash; we only feature items our editors love and approve of. HELLO! may collect a share of sales or other compensation from the links on this page. To find out more visit our </em><a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/news/2019061174038/reader-information-on-affiliate-links/">FAQ page</a>.</p>
item.dc:creator: Hollie Brotherton

item.title: It's your last chance to shop the Macy's Labor Day sale! Here are the 27 best deals at up to 60% off
item.description: <p>With summer winding down, we&#39;re looking ahead - and what better way to get ready for the new season than picking up some new outfits or refreshing our homes with some great buys during the Labor Day sales! And guess what? <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/macys/&qu ot;>Macy&rsquo;s</a> is tempting us with some fantastic deals to shop.</p> <p><strong>For Labor Day, Macy&#39;s is offering up to an extra 20% off on selected merchandise until September 6 with the promo code: LABOR.</strong></p> <h6 dir="ltr" style="line-height:1.38; margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt; text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://click.linksynergy.com/deeplink?id=ZuQBth*K/yI&amp;mid=3184&amp;murl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.macys.com%2Fshop%2Fcoupons-deals%3Fcm_sp%3Dnavigation-_-top_nav-_-deals%26lid%3Dglbtopnav_deals-us&amp;LSNSUBSITE=PR" rel="sponsored" style="text-decoration:none;" target="_blank" title="Macys sale">SHOP MACY&#39;S LABOR DAY SALE NOW</a></h6> <p>Right now you can<strong> </strong>browse the Macy&#39;s sale for thousands of discounts across pretty much every department, from fashion - and that&#39;s for women, men AND kids - to homeware, bed and bath and kitchen must-haves.</p> <h2>MORE LABOR DAY SALES:</h2> <p itemprop="headline"><a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/celebrity-style/20210901120842/coach-sale-jennifer-lopez-favorite-bag-basquiat-style/"><strong>Grab a Coach bag for up to 75% off - prices start at less than $100</strong></a></p> <p itemprop="headline"><a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/news/20210831120702/best-labor-day-weekend-sales-deals-discounts/"><strong>28 best Labor Day sales to shop right now</strong></a></p> <p itemprop="headline"><a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/news/20210831120752/asos-huge-labor-day-sale/"><strong>Stop everything! item.title: Shop the best August Bank Holiday sales TODAY: ASOS, Boots, John Lewis & MORE
item.description: <p>The summer <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/sales/"><strong>sales</strong></a> for 2021 culminate with the big August bank holiday weekend&nbsp;and you don&#39;t want to miss out. If you&#39;re looking to update your wardrobe, invest in some new interiors or get serious about skincare, there are some amazing deals around from the likes of <strong>ASOS, Boots, John Lewis, Marks &amp; Spencer, &amp; Other Stories&nbsp;and Charlotte Tilbury.</strong></p> <p><strong>SHOP: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/news/20210825120392/best-floral-dresses-we-love/">Floral dresses for your autumn wardrobe refresh</a></strong></p> <p><strong>MORE: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/hfm/2020090896830/work-outfit-ideas-shopping-inspiration/">Work outfit essentials for Autumn 2021: Go back to work in style</a></strong></p> <p>From beauty to homeware to fashion, read on for&nbsp;all of the best offers available&nbsp;right now, along with the discount codes you&#39;ll want to save.</p> <h3>Shop the best August bank holiday 2021 sales...</h3> <p>&nbsp;</p> <h2 dir="ltr" style="text-align:center">ASOS<meta charset="utf-8" /></h2> <p dir="ltr" style="text-align:center">ASOS has up to 80% off 1000s of items this bank holiday, plus you can get an extra 20% off using the code: SALEPLUS when you spend over &pound;25.</p> <h6 dir="ltr" style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.asos.com%2Fwomen%2F" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="asos">SHOP ASOS NOW</a></h6> <p dir="ltr">&nbsp;</p> <h2 dir="ltr" style="text-align:center">JOHN LEWIS&nbsp;</h2> <p dir="ltr" style="text-align:center">John Lewis has amazing savings across all categories for a limited time. This includes 60% off Hobbs and 50% off Sweaty Betty.&nbsp;</p> <h6 dir="ltr" style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=CLT---260821&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.johnlewis.com%2Fspecial-offers%2Fc50000110" rel="sponsored" title="john lewis sale">SHOP JOHN LEWIS NOW</a></h6> <p dir="ltr">&nbsp;</p> <h2 dir="ltr" style="text-align:center">BOOTS<meta charset="utf-8" /><meta charset="utf-8" /><meta charset="utf-8" /><meta charset="utf-8" /></h2> <p dir="ltr" style="text-align:center">This bank holiday you can save up to 15% off premium beauty, premium haircare and selected fragrances at Boots.</p> <h6 dir="ltr" style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.boots.com%2F" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="boots">SHOP BOOTS NOW</a></h6> <p dir="ltr">&nbsp;</p> <h2 dir="ltr" style="text-align:center">&amp; OTHER STORIES<meta charset="utf-8" /></h2> <p dir="ltr" style="text-align:center">From dresses to denim shorts, &amp; Other Stories has&nbsp;up&nbsp;to 40% off best-sellers in their Weekend Treat&nbsp;sale.</p> <h6 dir="ltr" style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://click.linksynergy.com/deeplink?id=ZuQBth*K/yI&amp;mid=41994&amp;u1=CLT---260821&amp;murl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.stories.com%2Fen_gbp%2Fspecial-prices%2Fweekend-treat%2Fall-weekend-treat.html" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="&amp; other stories">SHOP &amp; OTHER STORIES SALE&nbsp;NOW</a></h6> <p dir="ltr" style="text-align:center"><strong>RELATED:&nbsp;<a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/hfm/20210526114008/best-and-other-stories-dresses-for-summer/">&amp; Other Stories summer dresses we&rsquo;ll be wearing on repeat</a></strong></p> <p dir="ltr" style="text-align:center">&nbsp;</p> <h2 dir="ltr" style="text-align:center">MARKS &amp; SPENCER&nbsp;</h2> <p dir="ltr" style="text-align:center">There&#39;s up to 40% off homeware at M&amp;S, including must-have&nbsp;bedding, lighting and plants.</p> <h6 dir="ltr" style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=HME---260821&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.marksandspencer.com%2Fl%2Foffers%2Fhome-offers" rel="sponsored" title="Marks &amp; Spencer sale">SHOP MARKS &amp; SPENCER NOW</a></h6> <p dir="ltr">&nbsp;</p> <h2 dir="ltr" style="text-align:center">THE WHITE COMPANY</h2> <p dir="ltr" style="text-align:center">Save up to 60% off at The White Company, from their cosy pyjamas to babywear and bedding.</p> <h6 dir="ltr" style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.thewhitecompany.com%2Fuk%2Fc%2Fsale" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="twc">SHOP THE WHITE COMPANY SALE NOW</a></h6> <p dir="ltr">&nbsp;</p> <h2 dir="ltr" style="text-align:center">MATCHESFASHION</h2> <p dir="ltr" style="text-align:center">Shop incredible designer brands with up to 60% off in Matches&#39; bank holiday sale.</p> <h6 dir="ltr" style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://click.linksynergy.com/deeplink?id=ZuQBth*K/yI&amp;mid=35725&amp;murl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.matchesfashion.com%2Fwomens%2Fsale" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="Matches Fashion">SHOP MATCHESFASHION SALE NOW</a></h6> <p dir="ltr">&nbsp;</p> <h2 dir="ltr" style="text-align:center">NIKE<meta charset="utf-8" /></h2> <p dir="ltr" style="text-align:center">Members can take 25% off their favourites using the code: BTS21 at the checkout.</p> <h6 dir="ltr" style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=CLT---260821&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.nike.com%2Fgb%2F" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="Nike">SHOP NIKE NOW</a></h6> <p dir="ltr">&nbsp;</p> <h2 dir="ltr" style="text-align:center">MADE</h2> <p dir="ltr" style="text-align:center">There&#39;s free delivery and&nbsp;an extra 10% off clearance at&nbsp;MADE for a limited time only.</p> <h6 dir="ltr" style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.made.com%2Fsale" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="new look">SHOP MADE NOW</a></h6> <p dir="ltr">&nbsp;</p> <h2 dir="ltr" style="text-align:center">NEW LOOK</h2> <p dir="ltr" style="text-align:center">New Look is offering up to 25% off (almost) everything with the code: BANKHOL25&nbsp;&ndash; item.title: The Cult Beauty advent calendar 2021 is finally here and it's definitely going to sell out
item.description: <p>It&#39;s hard to believe, but the most wonderful time of the year is almost here - beauty <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/advent-calendars/"><strong>advent calendar</strong></a> season. Gone are the days when we wanted to countdown to <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/christmas/"><strong>Christmas</strong></a> with chocolate. Now opening a door to a beauty treat each day in December is the only way to do it, and we&#39;re always excited about Cult Beauty&#39;s advent calendar.</p> <p><strong>RELATED: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/healthandbeauty/20210907121109/best-beauty-advent-calendars-to-buy/">The&nbsp;best beauty advent calendars you can shop now for Christmas 2021&nbsp;</a></strong></p> <h2>What is the Cult Beauty advent calendar this year?&nbsp;</h2> <p>Promising a range of the online retailer&#39;s premium skincare, makeup and fragrance, this year it&#39;s bigger and better than ever.</p> <p><img alt="cult-beauty-advent-calendar" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/healthandbeauty/20210826120452/cult-beauty-advent-calendar-christmas/0-582-16/cult-beauty-advent-calendar-z.jpg" title="cult-beauty-advent-calendar" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Cult Beauty Advent Calendar 2021, &pound;215, <a class="aff_text" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=BEA-U250--260821&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.cultbeauty.co.uk%2Fcult-beauty-cult-beauty-advent-calendar-2021.html%3FranMID%3D35269%26ranEAID%3DfZYk0n0yYYI%26ranSiteID%3DfZYk0n0yYYI-os2EYFKTYpCyo8Z2E.8LMA%26utm_source%3DLS%26utm_medium%3Daffil%26utm_campaign%3Dgeneric%26siteID%3DfZYk0n0yYYI-os2EYFKTYpCyo8Z2E.8LMA%26publisher_name%3DThe%2BIndependent" rel="sponsored" title="Cult Beauty advent calendar">Cult Beauty</a></strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=BEA-U250--260821&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.cultbeauty.co.uk%2Fcult-beauty-cult-beauty-advent-calendar-2021.html%3FranMID%3D35269%26ranEAID%3DfZYk0n0yYYI%26ranSiteID%3DfZYk0n0yYYI-os2EYFKTYpCyo8Z2E.8LMA%26utm_source%3DLS%26utm_medium%3Daffil%26utm_campaign%3Dgeneric%26siteID%3DfZYk0n0yYYI-os2EYFKTYpCyo8Z2E.8LMA%26publisher_name%3DThe%2BIndependent" rel="sponsored" title="Cult Beauty advent calendar">SHOP NOW</a></h6> <h2>What&#39;s inside the Cult Beauty advent calendar for 2021?&nbsp;</h2> <p>The 38-piece edit is confirmed to include Charlotte Tilbury, Victoria Beckham Beauty, Augustinus Bader, Drunk Elephant and Sunday Riley, plus a money-can&#39;t-buy exclusive gift.</p> <p>Want some spoilers on what&#39;s inside? We can reveal there&#39;s a Too Faced Better Than Sex mascara, the Augustinus Bader Face Oil, Laura Mercier&rsquo;s Translucent Setting Powder and Drunk Elephant&rsquo;s&nbsp;T.L.C Framboos Glycolic Night Serum, to name just a few.</p> <p>Even better, this year Cult Beauty is supporting two initiatives during the run up to Christmas. They are donating &pound;40,000 to the Beauty Backed Trust, an organisation which has supported beauty professionals through grants, mentorships, and masterclasses during the COVID-19 pandemic. Plus, they&#39;re working with ClimatePartner to plant a tree for every advent calendar sold.</p> <p><strong>MORE:&nbsp;<a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/hfm/20211007123428/best-jewellery-advent-calendars/">The MAC Advent Calendar for 2021 is flying off the virtual shelves - and it&#39;s worth over &pound;340</a></strong></p> <h2>Will the golden ticket be inside this year&#39;s Cult Beauty advent calendar?</h2> <p>Yes, one lucky calendar will also include a Golden ticket worth &pound;1000 of Cult Beauty points!</p> <h2>When does the Cult Beauty advent calendar go on sale?&nbsp;</h2> <p>The advent calendar is now officially on sale.&nbsp;There&#39;s a limited number available and it sells out every year, so If you want to get your hands on it you&#39;ll have to be quick.</p> <h2>How much is the Cult Beauty advent calendar?&nbsp;</h2> <p>The expertly curated collection is worth over &pound;960 but costs just &pound;215!</p> <p><strong>MORE: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/hfm/20211007123428/best-jewellery-advent-calendars/">The Missoma advent calendar 2021 is finally here and it&#39;s a beauty</a></strong></p> <p style="font-size:12px"><em>HELLO!&#39;s selection is editorial and independently chosen &ndash; we only feature items our editors love and approve of. HELLO! may collect a share of sales or other compensation from the links on this page. To find out more visit our </em><a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/news/2019061174038/reader-information-on-affiliate-links/">FAQ page</a>.</p>
item.dc:creator: Hollie Brotherton

item.title: Jennifer Garner is a vision in a dreamy white dress that we werenât expecting
item.description: <p dir="ltr">It&rsquo;s no secret that <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/jennifer-garner/"><strong>Jennifer Garner</strong></a> lives in leggings. It&rsquo;s one of her main wardrobe staples, and the <em>Yes Day</em> star is spotted in them often when she&rsquo;s out and about.&nbsp;</p> <p dir="ltr"><strong>MORE: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/hfm/20210512112988/best-white-summer-dresses-we-love/">Shop the best white dresses we&#39;re loving right now</a></strong></p> <p dir="ltr">But when the actress stepped out in Los Angeles on Tuesday, she switched things up in the best way, rocking a look that was perfect for wrapping up the last days of summer - a chic white shirt dress.</p> <p><img alt="jennifer-garner-white-dress" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/celebrity-style/20210825120417/jennifer-garner-dreamy-white-dress-los-angeles/0-581-925/jennifer-garner-white-dress-z.jpg" title="jennifer-garner-white-dress" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Jennifer stunned in her chic white shirt dress</strong></p> <p dir="ltr">Jennifer was spotted wearing a long, chic white shirt dress topped with striped detailing, and she paired it with black sunglasses, a thin gold necklace, and her trusty sneakers.&nbsp;</p> <h2 dir="ltr" style="text-align:center"><strong>GET JENNIFER GARNER&#39;S LOOK FOR LESS!</strong></h2> <p dir="ltr"><strong><img alt="long-white-dress" tomato-based pasta sauces. The simple design can be styled with a pair of sneakers like Jennifer, or a pair of flat sandals. Alternatively, they can be styled dressed up with heels and a few glam accessories.&nbsp;</p> <p dir="ltr"><strong>MORE: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/celebrity-style/20210821120075/jennifer-garner-bikini-body-swimsuit-selfie-beach-vacation-physique/">Jennifer Garner sizzles in swimsuit selfie we did not see coming</a></strong></p> <p><em><strong>Like this story?<a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/newsletter/?utm_source=article&amp;utm_medium=website&amp;utm_campaign=newsletter-signup"> Sign up to our newsletter</a> to get other stories like this delivered straight to your inbox.</strong></em></p> <p style="font-size:12px"><em>HELLO!&#39;s selection is editorial and independently chosen &ndash; we only feature items our editors love and approve of. To find out more visit our </em><a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/news/2019061174038/reader-information-on-affiliate-links/">FAQ page</a>.</p>
item.dc:creator: Brandi Fowler

item.title: We spied these 8 bestselling women's trainer brands for less on eBay
item.description: <p>We spent lockdown searching for the best fashion <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/footwear/"><strong>trainers</strong></a> and <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/healthandbeauty/health-and-fitness/"><strong>running</strong></a> shoes, since our poor gym sneakers went on a sabbatical. Now we&rsquo;re back in the real world, we&rsquo;ve found a new love for women&rsquo;s fashion trainers &ndash; they&rsquo;re comfy, cool and look fab with a <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/hfm/20210513113094/ebay-pretty-dresses-we-love/"><strong>floral dress</strong></a>.</p> <p><strong>MORE: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/royal-style/2020081395310/a-look-at-kate-middleton-ultra-cool-trainer-collection/">12 times Kate Middleton showed off her enviable trainer collection</a></strong></p> <p>Trainers are your BFF, trust us. Even Kate Middleton agrees, who wears her <a class="aff_text" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fe%2Ffashion%2Fbo-womenswear%2Ftrainers%2F95672%3Frt%3Dnc%26amp%3BBrand%3DSuperga%26amp%3Bmkcid%3D1%26amp%3Bmkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26amp%3Bsiteid%3D3%26amp%3Bcampid%3D5338828028%26amp%3Btoolid%3D20008%26amp%3Bmkevt%3D1" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="superga"><strong>Superga sneakers</strong></a> on repeat. And our sneaker research found us stumbling upon <a class="aff_text" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fvlp2%2Fbrand-outlet%3Fmkcid%3D1%26amp%3Bmkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26amp%3Bsiteid%3D3%26amp%3Bcampid%3D5338828028%26amp%3Btoolid%3D20008%26amp%3Bmkevt%3D1" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="brand outlet"><strong>eBay Brand Outlet</strong></a> and their hundreds of brand new, box fresh trainers from our favourite brands, including Adidas, Nike and New Balance &ndash; all up to 70% off.</p> <p><strong>Shop the best women&rsquo;s trainer brands on eBay</strong></p> <p><img alt="superga-trainers" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/news/20210819119936/best-ebay-womens-trainers-brands/0-589-889/superga-trainers-z.jpg" title="superga-trainers" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Superga 2750 Cotu trainers, RRP &pound;55, NOW &pound;53, <a class="aff_text" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fitm%2F284292094264%3Fhash%3Ditem4231211938%253Ag%253ARs4AAOSwEENgm--T%26amp%3B_trkparms%3D%252526rpp_cid%25253D6059d88c46947f15954c5f9c%26amp%3Bvar%3D585824603443%26amp%3Bmkcid%3D1%26amp%3Bmkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26amp%3Bsiteid%3D3%26amp%3Bcampid%3D5338828028%26amp%3Btoolid%3D20008%26amp%3Bmkevt%3D1" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="superga">eBay Brand Outlet</a></strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fitm%2F284292094264%3Fhash%3Ditem4231211938%253Ag%253ARs4AAOSwEENgm--T%26amp%3B_trkparms%3D%252526rpp_cid%25253D6059d88c46947f15954c5f9c%26amp%3Bvar%3D585824603443%26amp%3Bmkcid%3D1%26amp%3Bmkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26amp%3Bsiteid%3D3%26amp%3Bcampid%3D5338828028%26amp%3Btoolid%3D20008%26amp%3Bmkevt%3D1" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="superga"><strong>SHOP NOW</strong></a></h6> <p>Superga trainers are the favourite of Kate Middleton, who owns the 2750 Cotu style in white and khaki - we love these slightly lilac versions for a little colour.</p> <p><img alt="new-balance" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/news/20210819119936/best-ebay-womens-trainers-brands/0-579-948/new-balance-z.jpg" title="new-balance" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>New Balance 574 women&rsquo;s trainers, RRP &pound;79.99, NOW &pound;43.94, <a class="aff_text" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fitm%2F353527308444%3Fmkcid%3D1%26amp%3Bmkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26amp%3Bsiteid%3D3%26amp%3Bcampid%3D5338828028%26amp%3Btoolid%3D20008%26amp%3Bmkevt%3D1" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="new balance">eBay Brand Outlet</a></strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fitm%2F353527308444%3Fmkcid%3D1%26amp%3Bmkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26amp%3Bsiteid%3D3%26amp%3Bcampid%3D5338828028%26amp%3Btoolid%3D20008%26amp%3Bmkevt%3D1" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="new balance"><strong>SHOP NOW</strong></a></h6> <p>One look on Instagram and you&rsquo;ll see New Balance worn by all your favourite fashion influencers. The easy-to-wear trainer brand has fast become a style favourite, with famous fans including Kate Middleton and Jennifer Garner &ndash; so you&rsquo;re in good company!</p> <p><img alt="superstar-adidas" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/news/20210819119936/best-ebay-womens-trainers-brands/0-589-869/superstar-adidas-z.jpg" title="superstar-adidas" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Adidas Superstar women&rsquo;s trainers, RRP &pound;79.99, NOW &pound;53.94, <a class="aff_text" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fitm%2F353620358488%3Fhash%3Ditem52556a7558%253Ag%253AToEAAOSwHvthFOsd%26amp%3B_trkparms%3D%252526rpp_cid%25253D6059d88c46947f15954c5f9c%26amp%3Bvar%3D622939035797%26amp%3Bmkcid%3D1%26amp%3Bmkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26amp%3Bsiteid%3D3%26amp%3Bcampid%3D5338828028%26amp%3Btoolid%3D20008%26amp%3Bmkevt%3D1" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="adidas">eBay Brand Outlet </a></strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fitm%2F353620358488%3Fhash%3Ditem52556a7558%253Ag%253AToEAAOSwHvthFOsd%26amp%3B_trkparms%3D%252526rpp_cid%25253D6059d88c46947f15954c5f9c%26amp%3Bvar%3D622939035797%26amp%3Bmkcid%3D1%26amp%3Bmkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26amp%3Bsiteid%3D3%26amp%3Bcampid%3D5338828028%26amp%3Btoolid%3D20008%26amp%3Bmkevt%3D1" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="adidas"><strong>SHOP NOW</strong></a></h6> <p>Trainers don&rsquo;t get much more classic than a pair of Adidas. Their best-selling styles include the Stan Smith, the Ultraboost and these, the Superstar. We particularly love the snakeskin accents.</p> <p><strong>SHOP:&nbsp;<a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/hfm/20210920122108/best-quilted-jackets-for-women/">Q</a><a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/hfm/20210920122108/best-quilted-jackets-for-women/">uilted jackets are trending for women - here&#39;s the best styles to shop</a></strong></p> <p><img alt="nike-grey-trainers" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/news/20210819119936/best-ebay-womens-trainers-brands/0-589-873/nike-grey-trainers-z.jpg" title="nike-grey-trainers" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Nike Elie Shinsen Running&nbsp;women&rsquo;s trainers, RRP &pound;69.99, NOW &pound;42,&nbsp;<a class="aff_text" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fitm%2F114232014609%3Fhash%3Ditem1a98c23711%253Ag%253ACTMAAOSwOPVex48J%26amp%3B_trkparms%3D%252526rpp_cid%25253D6059d88c46947f15954c5f9c%26amp%3Bvar%3D414485975871%26amp%3Bmkcid%3D1%26amp%3Bmkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26amp%3Bsiteid%3D3%26amp%3Bcampid%3D5338828028%26amp%3Btoolid%3D20008%26amp%3Bmkevt%3D1" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="nike">eBay Brand Outlet </a></strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fitm%2F114232014609%3Fhash%3Ditem1a98c23711%253Ag%253ACTMAAOSwOPVex48J%26amp%3B_trkparms%3D%252526rpp_cid%25253D6059d88c46947f15954c5f9c%26amp%3Bvar%3D414485975871%26amp%3Bmkcid%3D1%26amp%3Bmkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26amp%3Bsiteid%3D3%26amp%3Bcampid%3D5338828028%26amp%3Btoolid%3D20008%26amp%3Bmkevt%3D1" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="nike"><strong>SHOP NOW</strong></a></h6> <p>Nike are up there as one of the most loved trainer brands of all time, and their running sneakers are top notch - whether you&#39;re a seasoned marathon runner or a couch to 5k newbie.</p> <p><img alt="converse" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/news/20210819119936/best-ebay-womens-trainers-brands/0-579-963/converse-z.jpg" title="converse" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Converse Chuck Taylor Low Rise women&rsquo;s trainers, &pound;44.99, <a class="aff_text" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fitm%2F161256372458%3Fmkcid%3D1%26amp%3Bmkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26amp%3Bsiteid%3D3%26amp%3Bcampid%3D5338828028%26amp%3Btoolid%3D20008%26amp%3Bmkevt%3D1" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="converse">eBay Brand Outlet </a></strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fitm%2F161256372458%3Fmkcid%3D1%26amp%3Bmkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26amp%3Bsiteid%3D3%26amp%3Bcampid%3D5338828028%26amp%3Btoolid%3D20008%26amp%3Bmkevt%3D1" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="converse"><strong>SHOP NOW</strong></a></h6> <p>Converse&rsquo;s timeless Chuck Taylor canvas sneakers are loved the world over, and we love wearing ours with dresses for a pared-back look. You can choose from various shades including white, black, red and pink.</p> <p><img alt="fila" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/news/20210819119936/best-ebay-womens-trainers-brands/0-579-959/fila-z.jpg" title="fila" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Fila RGB Fuse women&rsquo;s trainers, RRP &pound;51.99, NOW &pound;41.99, <a class="aff_text" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fitm%2F334086170743%3Fmkcid%3D1%26amp%3Bmkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26amp%3Bsiteid%3D3%26amp%3Bcampid%3D5338828028%26amp%3Btoolid%3D20008%26amp%3Bmkevt%3D1" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="fila">eBay Brand Outlet</a></strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fitm%2F334086170743%3Fmkcid%3D1%26amp%3Bmkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26amp%3Bsiteid%3D3%26amp%3Bcampid%3D5338828028%26amp%3Btoolid%3D20008%26amp%3Bmkevt%3D1" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="fila"><strong>SHOP NOW</strong></a></h6> <p>A chunky trainer is a wardrobe must, and we love Fila&rsquo;s take on the trend. Featuring a breathable, mesh upper and tonal fastening, Fila&rsquo;s known for their retro styles and we love this pair.</p> <p><strong>MORE: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/healthandbeauty/health-and-fitness/2020051289665/best-trainers-for-women/">These are the best women&#39;s trainers for sports</a></strong></p> <p><img alt="reebok" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/news/20210819119936/best-ebay-womens-trainers-brands/0-589-874/reebok-z.jpg" title="reebok" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Reebok Classic vintage style women&rsquo;s trainers, RRP &pound;69.99, NOW &pound;31.99, <a class="aff_text" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fitm%2F294255395137%3Fhash%3Ditem4482fd0141%253Ag%253AX3QAAOSwHDJhQJll%26amp%3B_trkparms%3D%252526rpp_cid%25253D6059d88c46947f15954c5f9c%26amp%3Bvar%3D592913870820%26amp%3Bmkcid%3D1%26amp%3Bmkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26amp%3Bsiteid%3D3%26amp%3Bcampid%3D5338828028%26amp%3Btoolid%3D20008%26amp%3Bmkevt%3D1" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="reebok">eBay Brand Outlet </a></strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fitm%2F294255395137%3Fhash%3Ditem4482fd0141%253Ag%253AX3QAAOSwHDJhQJll%26amp%3B_trkparms%3D%252526rpp_cid%25253D6059d88c46947f15954c5f9c%26amp%3Bvar%3D592913870820%26amp%3Bmkcid%3D1%26amp%3Bmkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26amp%3Bsiteid%3D3%26amp%3Bcampid%3D5338828028%26amp%3Btoolid%3D20008%26amp%3Bmkevt%3D1" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="reebok"><strong>SHOP NOW</strong></a></h6> <p>Reebok trainers have a distinctively Reebok look, and are a bit of a cult fave. You can&rsquo;t beat a pink pair of sneakers, like this deliciously pastel pair.</p> <p><img alt="puma" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/news/20210819119936/best-ebay-womens-trainers-brands/0-579-938/puma-z.jpg" title="puma" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Puma Fenty by Rihanna Creeper women&rsquo;s trainers, RRP &pound;160, NOW &pound;29.99, <a class="aff_text" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fitm%2F312300356167%3Fmkcid%3D1%26amp%3Bmkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26amp%3Bsiteid%3D3%26amp%3Bcampid%3D5338828028%26amp%3Btoolid%3D20008%26amp%3Bmkevt%3D1" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="puma">eBay Brand Outlet</a></strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fitm%2F312300356167%3Fmkcid%3D1%26amp%3Bmkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26amp%3Bsiteid%3D3%26amp%3Bcampid%3D5338828028%26amp%3Btoolid%3D20008%26amp%3Bmkevt%3D1" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="puma"><strong>SHOP NOW</strong></a></h6> <p>Who doesn&rsquo;t love a celeb collaboration, especially when it results in trainers as cool as these? Puma teamed up with Rihanna on a selection of sneakers, including these platformed creepers.</p> <p><strong>MORE: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/hfm/20210316108979/ebay-fashion-outlet-brands-to-know/">10 secret eBay fashion outlet brands we&nbsp;discovered</a></strong></p> <p style="font-size:12px"><em>HELLO!&#39;s selection is editorial and independently chosen &ndash; we only feature items our editors love and approve of. item.title: Varsity sweatshirts are seriously trending right now - here's 11 of our favourites
item.description: <p>If you follow any curated fashion accounts on Instagram, you&#39;ll definitely have seen&nbsp;<a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/princess-diana/"><strong>Princess Diana</strong></a> in her varsity sweatshirt and cycling shorts combo. The now-iconic look has been emulated many times, and after over a year of lockdowns and loungewear, the preppy athleisure style has never been more popular.</p> <p><strong>RELATED:&nbsp;<a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/royal-style/2020092397746/princess-diana-harvard-sweatshirt-lookalike-hm/">Remember Princess Diana&#39;s iconic Harvard sweatshirt? item.title: Best affordable wedding guest dresses for 2021- here's our favourites
item.description: <p>With post-lockdown <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/wedding-shop/"><strong>weddings</strong></a> filling up our social calendars (finally!) it&rsquo;s been a while since we&rsquo;ve had to find the best wedding guest dress or outfit & ndash; and everyone&rsquo;s turning to <a href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fe%2Ffashion%2Fbo-womenswear%3Fmkcid%3D1%26amp%3Bmkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26amp%3Bsiteid%3D3%26amp%3Bcampid%3D5338824557%26amp%3Btoolid%3D20008%26amp%3Bmkevt%3D1"><strong>eBay Brand Outlet</strong></a> for <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/brides/20210614115088/wedding-guest-outfits/"><strong>wedding outfits</strong></a>&nbsp;with discounts.</p> <p>If you really want to go all out, there&rsquo;s plenty of affordable fascinators and hats for weddings, plus shoes, bags and accessories to really elevate your look on there too. Add strappy sandals to dance the night away in.</p> <p><img alt="black-floral" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/hfm/20210805118960/ebay-sale-wedding-guest-looks-to-try/0-575-634/black-floral-z.jpg" title="black-floral" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Dorothy Perkins floral satin dress, was &pound;39.99, NOW &pound;9.99, <a class="aff_text" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fitm%2F193786904868%3Fhash%3Ditem2d1e998124%253Ag%253AHjcAAOSwvwRgKlFq%26amp%3B_trkparms%3D%252526rpp_cid%25253D5f64dacc2d1b078be21f5412%26amp%3Bvar%3D494017847696%26amp%3Bmkcid%3D1%26amp%3Bmkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26amp%3Bsiteid%3D3%26amp%3Bcampid%3D5338824557%26amp%3Btoolid%3D20008%26amp%3Bmkevt%3D1" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="DP dress">eBay Brand Outlet</a></strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fitm%2F193786904868%3Fhash%3Ditem2d1e998124%253Ag%253AHjcAAOSwvwRgKlFq%26amp%3B_trkparms%3D%252526rpp_cid%25253D5f64dacc2d1b078be21f5412%26amp%3Bvar%3D494017847696%26amp%3Bmkcid%3D1%26amp%3Bmkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26amp%3Bsiteid%3D3%26amp%3Bcampid%3D5338824557%26amp%3Btoolid%3D20008%26amp%3Bmkevt%3D1" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="floral dress"><strong>SHOP NOW</strong></a></h6> <p>Planning ahead for an autumnal wedding? Add the drama with Dorothy Perkins&#39; luxe-looking floral satin dress. Chic!</p> <h2><strong>Shop the best hair fascinators for weddings</strong></h2> <p><img alt="OB-hairband" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/hfm/20210805118960/ebay-sale-wedding-guest-looks-to-try/0-581-152/ob-hairband-z.jpg" title="OB-hairband" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Oliver Bonas plaited hairband, was &pound;21.50, NOW &pound;6, <a class="aff_text" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fitm%2F203483422299%3Fhash%3Ditem2f608e9e5b%253Ag%253ALzIAAOSwq2phG3fG%26amp%3B_trkparms%3D%252526rpp_cid%25253D6059d88c46947f15954c5f9c%26amp%3Bmkcid%3D1%26amp%3Bmkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26amp%3Bsiteid%3D3%26amp%3Bcampid%3D5338824557%26amp%3Btoolid%3D20008%26amp%3Bmkevt%3D1" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="ob hairband">eBay Brand Outlet</a></strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fitm%2F203483422299%3Fhash%3Ditem2f608e9e5b%253Ag%253ALzIAAOSwq2phG3fG%26amp%3B_trkparms%3D%252526rpp_cid%25253D6059d88c46947f15954c5f9c%26amp%3Bmkcid%3D1%26amp%3Bmkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26amp%3Bsiteid%3D3%26amp%3Bcampid%3D5338824557%26amp%3Btoolid%3D20008%26amp%3Bmkevt%3D1" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="ob hairband"><strong>SHOP NOW</strong></a></h6> <p>This silk hairband is a great addition to a more subdued look - and very Kate Middleton, too.</p> <p><strong>SEE: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/brides/gallery/20210707116993/royal-wedding-hats-photos-sophie-wessex-princess-beatrice/1/">The most striking royal wedding hats</a></strong></p> <p><img alt="blue-fascinator" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/hfm/20210805118960/ebay-sale-wedding-guest-looks-to-try/0-575-639/blue-fascinator-z.jpg" title="blue-fascinator" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Phase Eight weave fascinator hat, was &pound;59, NOW &pound;14.75, <a class="aff_text" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fitm%2F313208320154%3Fmkcid%3D1%26amp%3Bmkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26amp%3Bsiteid%3D3%26amp%3Bcampid%3D5338824557%26amp%3Btoolid%3D20008%26amp%3Bmkevt%3D1" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="blue hat">eBay Brand Outlet</a> </strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fitm%2F313208320154%3Fmkcid%3D1%26amp%3Bmkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26amp%3Bsiteid%3D3%26amp%3Bcampid%3D5338824557%26amp%3Btoolid%3D20008%26amp%3Bmkevt%3D1" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="blue hat"><strong>SHOP NOW</strong></a></h6> <p>Statement making, Phase Eight&rsquo;s cornflower blue fascinator is definitely the one if you want to stand out. Pair with a pink or floral dress for clashing like a pro.</p> <p><img alt="pillobiox" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/hfm/20210805118960/ebay-sale-wedding-guest-looks-to-try/0-575-640/pillobiox-z.jpg" title="pillobiox" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Phase Eight Pillbox fascinator, was &pound;12.05, NOW &pound;49, <a class="aff_text" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fitm%2F313274766735%3Fmkcid%3D1%26amp%3Bmkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26amp%3Bsiteid%3D3%26amp%3Bcampid%3D5338824557%26amp%3Btoolid%3D20008%26amp%3Bmkevt%3D1" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="pillbox">eBay Brand Outlet</a> </strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.ebay.co.uk%2Fitm%2F313274766735%3Fmkcid%3D1%26amp%3Bmkrid%3D710-53481-19255-0%26amp%3Bsiteid%3D3%26amp%3Bcampid%3D5338824557%26amp%3Btoolid%3D20008%26amp%3Bmkevt%3D1" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="pillbox"><strong>SHOP NOW&nbsp;</strong></a></h6> <p>We love the retro feel of Phase Eight&rsquo;s pillbox fascinator; wear with a vintage-style dress and matching red lipstick.</p> <p>&nbsp;</p> <p style="font-size:12px"><em>HELLO!&#39;s selection is editorial and independently chosen &ndash; we only feature items our editors love and approve of. HELLO! may collect a share of sales or other compensation from the links on this page. To find out more visit our </em><a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/news/2019061174038/reader-information-on-affiliate-links/">FAQ page</a>.</p>
item.dc:creator: Carla Challis

item.title: ASOS just put lots of summer dresses on sale with up to 50% off - these 16 are our absolute favourites
item.description: <p>ASOS, our one-stop-shop for every sartorial essential, is having <a class="aff_text" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=---020821&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.asos.com%2Fwomen%2Fctas%2Fgeneric-promos%2Fpromotion-8%2Fcat%2F%3Fcid%3D28245%26ctaref%3Dhp%7Cww%7Cpromo%7Cbanner%7C1%7Cedit%7Cgeneric" rel="sponsored" title="ASOS sale"><strong>a huge summer sale</strong></a>. While we love having all of our fashion favourites in one place, it does mean scrolling to find what you want can become a bit of a mission.</p> <p><strong>RELATED:&nbsp;</strong><a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/hfm/20210512112988/best-white-summer-dresses-we-love/"><strong>The best white summer dresses to wear now that the sunshine is here</strong></a></p> <p><strong>MORE: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/news/20210603114468/amazon-summer-dresses-we-love/">Super stylish summer dresses we found on Amazon</a></strong></p> <p>So to make your life easier, we&#39;ve searched through the sale to find all of the best dresses you&#39;ll want to add to your basket. Summer is far from over and there will be plenty more opportunities to wear that cute new floral mini or flowing midi dress. Read on for 16&nbsp;of the best summer dresses to buy now, from &amp; Other Stories to Topshop and Whistles to ASOS DESIGN.</p> <p><img alt="New-Look-summer-dress-sale" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/news/20210802118738/asos-sale-best-summer-dresses/0-574-520/new-look-summer-dress-sale-z.jpg" title="New-Look-summer-dress-sale" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>New Look tie strap mini sundress in white, was &pound;15.99 now &pound;11.15, <a class="aff_text" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=CLT-U25--02082021&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.asos.com%2Fnew-look%2Fnew-look-tie-strap-mini-sundress-in-white%2Fprd%2F23809700" rel="sponsored" title="New Look dress">ASOS</a></strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=CLT-U25--02082021&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.asos.com%2Fnew-look%2Fnew-look-tie-strap-mini-sundress-in-white%2Fprd%2F23809700" rel="sponsored" title="New Look dress">SHOP NOW</a></h6> <p>The perfect white mini comes in the form of this square neck, tie-strap dress from New Look. Pair with espadrille wedges or <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/news/20210618115695/amazon-birkenstocks-dupes-best-reviews/"><strong>Birkenstocks</strong></a>.</p> <p><img alt="Vero-moda-dress-2" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/news/20210802118738/asos-sale-best-summer-dresses/0-578-670/vero-moda-dress-2-z.jpg" title="Vero-moda-dress-2" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Vero Moda organic cotton maxi dress</strong><strong>, was &pound;38 now &pound;30.40, <a class="aff_text" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=CLT-U50--160821&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.asos.com%2Fvero-moda%2Fvero-moda-organic-cotton-maxi-dress-in-abstract-print%2Fprd%2F24097576%3Fcolourwayid%3D60538602%26cid%3D28245" rel="sponsored" title="New Look dress">ASOS</a></strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=CLT-U50--160821&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.asos.com%2Fvero-moda%2Fvero-moda-organic-cotton-maxi-dress-in-abstract-print%2Fprd%2F24097576%3Fcolourwayid%3D60538602%26cid%3D28245" rel="sponsored" title="New Look dress">SHOP NOW</a></h6> <p>We love this black and white printed maxi and right now it has 20% off.</p> <p><img alt="Whistles-dress" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/news/20210802118738/asos-sale-best-summer-dresses/0-574-524/whistles-dress-z.jpg" title="Whistles-dress" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Whistles English Garden wrap mini dress, was &pound;149&nbsp;now &pound;90, <a class="aff_text" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=CLT-U250--020821&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.asos.com%2Fwhistles%2Fwhistles-english-garden-wrap-mini-dress-in-green%2Fprd%2F200820052" rel="sponsored" title="Whistles dress">ASOS</a></strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=CLT-U250--020821&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.asos.com%2Fwhistles%2Fwhistles-english-garden-wrap-mini-dress-in-green%2Fprd%2F200820052" rel="sponsored" title="Whistles dress">SHOP NOW</a></h6> <p>Whistles must-have floral wrap dress comes in this gorgeous green print, and right now it has 40% off&nbsp;on ASOS.</p> <p><img alt="ASOS-tie-waist-dress" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/news/20210802118738/asos-sale-best-summer-dresses/0-578-658/asos-tie-waist-dress-z.jpg" title="ASOS-tie-waist-dress" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>ASOS DESIGN linen skater mini shirt dress</strong><strong>, was &pound;25 now &pound;12.75, <a class="aff_text" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=CLT---160821&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.asos.com%2Fasos-design%2Fasos-design-linen-skater-mini-shirt-dress-with-open-tie-waist-in-black%2Fprd%2F23045489%3Faffid%3D25897%26_CjwKCAjwmeiIBhA6EiwA-uaeFS5I2HcweYOTFJX-XDmiIbNs9SEbWkg8GWGAULCxKmma1oAF4VTcJhoC1t0QAvD_BwE%26channelref%3Dproduct%2Bsearch%26ppcadref%3D12029787983%257c117574734673%257cpla-296788358618%26gclid%3DCjwKCAjwmeiIBhA6EiwA-uaeFS5I2HcweYOTFJX-XDmiIbNs9SEbWkg8GWGAULCxKmma1oAF4VTcJhoC1t0QAvD_BwE%26gclsrc%3Daw.ds" rel="sponsored" title="ASOS dress">ASOS</a></strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=CLT---160821&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.asos.com%2Fasos-design%2Fasos-design-linen-skater-mini-shirt-dress-with-open-tie-waist-in-black%2Fprd%2F23045489%3Faffid%3D25897%26_CjwKCAjwmeiIBhA6EiwA-uaeFS5I2HcweYOTFJX-XDmiIbNs9SEbWkg8GWGAULCxKmma1oAF4VTcJhoC1t0QAvD_BwE%26channelref%3Dproduct%2Bsearch%26ppcadref%3D12029787983%257c117574734673%257cpla-296788358618%26gclid%3DCjwKCAjwmeiIBhA6EiwA-uaeFS5I2HcweYOTFJX-XDmiIbNs9SEbWkg8GWGAULCxKmma1oAF4VTcJhoC1t0QAvD_BwE%26gclsrc%3Daw.ds" rel="sponsored" title="ASOS dress">SHOP NOW</a></h6> <p>Look amazing in the tie-waist trend with this linen skater mini dress.</p> <p><img alt="Stories-sale-dress" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/news/20210802118738/asos-sale-best-summer-dresses/0-578-642/stories-sale-dress-z.jpg" title="Stories-sale-dress" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>&amp; Other Stories floral print&nbsp;mini dress, was &pound;85&nbsp;now &pound;46.75, <a class="aff_text" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=CLT-U100--160821&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.asos.com%2Fother-stories%2Fother-stories-small-floral-print-mini-dress-in-multi%2Fprd%2F23675373%3Fcolourwayid%3D60503182%26cid%3D5235" rel="sponsored" title="Whistles dress">SHOP NOW</a></h6> <p>This &amp; Other Stories dress mini is the&nbsp;perfect transitional dress as we move towards autumn.&nbsp;</p> <p><img alt="ASOS-design-white-midi" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/news/20210802118738/asos-sale-best-summer-dresses/0-574-526/asos-design-white-midi-z.jpg" rel="sponsored" title="ASOS dress">SHOP NOW</a></h6> <p>The white summer midi you&#39;ve been looking for now has 20% off. item.title: Meghan Markle's favorite fashion brands are on sale at Nordstrom with up to 60% off
item.description: <p dir="ltr" style="margin-bottom:0pt; margin-top:0pt"><a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/meghan-markle/"><strong>Meghan Markle</strong></a> became a fashion one-to-watch the minute she stepped out for the first time with <a hre f="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/meghan-markle/"><strong>Prince Harry</strong></a>, sending a message that she loves pared-down, timeless classics &ndash; and just might have found her Prince &ndash; with her crisp white <strong>Misha Nonoo</strong> &#39;Husband&#39; shirt (<strong><a class="aff_text" href="https://mishanonoo.com/products/the-husband-shirt-white" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="Misha Nonoo husband shirt">which you can still buy, by the way</a>)</strong>.</p> <p><strong>RELATED: <a href="http://editor2.hellomagazine.com/fashion/royal-style/20210818119895/meghan-markle-leaf-earrings-lookalike/">Loved Meghan Markle&#39;s $3,790 gold earrings? Nordstrom has a lookalike pair for just $35</a></strong></p> <p>Ever since then, royal fans have kept an eye out for <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/meghan-markle-style/"><strong>Meghan&#39;s fashion finds</strong></a> &ndash; and we&#39;ve discovered you can shop many of the Duchess of Sussex&#39;s favorite brands <strong><a class="aff_text" href="https://click.linksynergy.com/deeplink?id=ZuQBth*K/yI&amp;mid=1237&amp;u1=---&amp;murl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.nordstrom.com%2Fbrowse%2Fsale%2Fwomen%3Fbreadcrumb%3DHome%252FSale%252FWomen%26origin%3Dtopnav" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="Nordstrom clearance sale">on sale at Nordstrom</a>!</strong></p> <p>No matter what you&#39;re looking for to add to your wardrobe, you&#39;ll find a brand Meghan loves at <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/nordstrom/"><strong>Nordstrom</strong></a> to match.</p> <h2><strong>WHAT ARE MEGHAN MARKLE&#39;S FAVORITE FASHION BRANDS? </strong></h2> <p>On the hunt for some fabulous Meghan Markle-inspired jewelry? Check out Missoma and BaubleBar. Need some cool new sneakers as seen on the Duchess? Royal fave Veja is for you. Would you love to own a piece of Duchess-approved British fashion? Reiss and Hunter are definitely two brands you&#39;ll want to check out.</p> <p itemprop="headline"><strong>MORE: <a data-cke-saved-href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/celebrity-style/20210418111295/nordstrom-rack-huge-sale-meghan-markle-necklace/" href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/celebrity-style/20210418111295/nordstrom-rack-huge-sale-meghan-markle-necklace/"></a></strong></p> <p itemprop="headline"><a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/celebrity-style/20210418111295/nordstrom-rack-huge-sale-meghan-markle-necklace/"><strong>Loved Meghan Markle&#39;s initial necklace? Nordstrom Rack has a $20 lookalike </strong></a></p> <p itemprop="headline"><a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/royal-style/20210926122582/meghan-markle-wears-princess-diana-handbag/"><strong>Duchess Meghan looked super chic carrying Princess Diana&#39;s Dior handbag</strong></a></p> <p>Keep scrolling to discover all of Meghan Markle&#39;s favorite fashion brands...</p> <p>&nbsp;</p> <h2><strong>SHOP MEGHAN MARKLE FAVES ON SALE AT NORDSTROM</strong></h2> <p>Not only have we put together this edit of Meghan&#39;s favorite fashion labels, but the Nordstrom discounts mean you can get these looks for less! So get shopping with our handy list of Meghan Markle brands on sale at Nordstrom...</p> <p>&nbsp;</p> <h2 dir="ltr" style="text-align:center"><strong>BAUBLEBAR</strong></h2> <p dir="ltr"><img alt="meghan-markle-nordstrom sale baublebar" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/royal-style/20210729118549/meghan-markle-nordstrom-sale-favorite-fashion-brands/0-598-492/meghan-markle-nordstrom-sale-baublebar-z.jpg" title="meghan-markle-nordstrom sale baublebar" /></p> <p dir="ltr">Meghan has been a fan of Baublebar jewelry since her pre-Duchess days, and we&#39;re sure you&#39;ll love the women-founded brand&#39;s chic and affordable pieces, too.</p> <p dir="ltr"><img alt="meghan markle baublebar nordstrom sale initial necklace" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/royal-style/20210729118549/meghan-markle-nordstrom-sale-favorite-fashion-brands/0-598-486/meghan-markle-baublebar-nordstrom-sale-initial-necklace-z.jpg" title="meghan markle baublebar nordstrom sale initial necklace" /></p> <p dir="ltr" style="text-align:center"><strong><a class="aff_text" href="https://click.linksynergy.com/deeplink?id=ZuQBth*K/yI&amp;mid=1237&amp;u1=JWL-U50-RUK-&amp;murl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.nordstrom.com%2Fs%2Fbaublebar-iliana-initial-pendant-necklace%2F6525699%3Forigin%3Dcategory-personalizedsort%26breadcrumb%3DHome%252FBrands%252FBaubleBar%26color%3D713" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="meghan nordstrom sale">Initial Pendant Necklace</a>, was $38 now from $15.20</strong></p> <h6 dir="ltr" style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://click.linksynergy.com/deeplink?id=ZuQBth*K/yI&amp;mid=1237&amp;u1=JWL--RUK-&amp;murl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.nordstrom.com%2Fbrands%2Fbaublebar--10854%3Forigin%3DproductBrandLink" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="royal sale">SHOP BAUBLEBAR </a></h6> <p itemprop="headline"><br /> &nbsp;</p> <p itemprop="headline">&nbsp;</p> <h2 dir="ltr" style="text-align:center"><strong>BIRDIES</strong></h2> <p dir="ltr"><strong><img alt="meghan-markle-wearing birdies-shoes" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/royal-style/20210520110912/meghan-markle-nordstrom-sale-favorite-fashion-brands/0-548-868/meghan-markle-wearing-birdies-shoes-z.jpg" title="meghan-markle-wearing birdies-shoes" /></strong></p> <p dir="ltr">Meghan has been a fan of Birdies shoes for years - <a class="aff_text" href="https://click.linksynergy.com/deeplink?id=ZuQBth*K/yI&amp;mid=1237&amp;u1=SHO-U100-RUK-&amp;murl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.nordstrom.com%2Fs%2Fbirdies-the-starling-flat-women%2F5105377%3Forigin%3Dcategory-personalizedsort%26breadcrumb%3DHome%252FBrands%252FBirdies%26color%3D001" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="Meghan Markle Birdie loafers"><strong>including the brand&#39;s comfy $95 loafers</strong></a><strong>, </strong>which she&#39;s wearing above. Shop more looks on sale.</p> <p dir="ltr"><img alt="meghan markle birdies slides nordstrom sale" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/royal-style/20210729118549/meghan-markle-nordstrom-sale-favorite-fashion-brands/0-598-488/meghan-markle-birdies-slides-nordstrom-sale-z.jpg" title="meghan markle birdies slides nordstrom sale" /></p> <p dir="ltr" style="text-align:center"><strong><a class="aff_text" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="Meghan Markle Nordstrom">Birdies Robin Slide Sandal</a>, was $120 now $85</strong></p> <h6 dir="ltr" style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://click.linksynergy.com/deeplink?id=ZuQBth*K/yI&amp;mid=1237&amp;u1=---&amp;murl=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.nordstrom.com%2Fbrands%2Fbirdies--19473" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="royal sale"><strong>SHOP BIRDIES</strong></a></h6> <p dir="ltr">&nbsp;</p> <h2 dir="ltr" style="text-align:center"><strong>BOSS by HUGO BOSS</strong></h2> <p dir="ltr"><strong><img item.title: News just in: Stacey Solomon's In The Style collection has up to 60% off right now and it's selling fast
item.description: <p>If you&#39;ve been lusting after the dreamy summer dresses in <a class="aff_text" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=---&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.inthestyle.com%2Fstacey-solomon" rel="sponsored" title="Stacey Solomon In The Style"><strong>Stacey Solomon&#39;s new In The Style collection</strong></a>, we&#39;ve got some amazing news for you. Right now you can shop everything with up to 60% off.</p> <p><strong>RELATED:&nbsp;<a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/celebrity-style/20210724118166/stacey-solomon-floral-dress-with-statement-bib-collar-nobodys-child/">Stacey Solomon&#39;s stunning floral dress has a royal twist</a></strong></p> <p><strong>MORE: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/hfm/20210403110278/best-gingham-dresses/">The best gingham print dresses for summer 2021</a></strong></p> <p>The <em>Loose Women</em> presenter launched the collection in June, following the success of her first collaboration with the online retailer earlier this year - their biggest launch in history - and as you can imagine, it&#39;s selling out super fast.</p> <p>Some of the most-loved styles include her puff-sleeve white midi dress, a white tiered Bardot dress and a blue floral smock mini dress. Plus, you&#39;ll also find slogan tees, printed jumpsuits and accessories to complete your summer wardrobe.</p> <p><img alt="Stacey-white-dress"
