item.title: ASOS shoppers rave over 'perfect' Â£135 backless wedding dress
item.description: <p>When budgeting for your wedding, we imagine your <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/wedding-dresses/"><strong>dress</strong></a> comes in high on your list of priorities. Thankfully, if you&#39;re looking to make your big day more affordable, you can find some amazing options on the high street. Case in point? This backless bridal gown from ASOS.</p> <p>The <a class="aff_text" href="http://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.asos.com%2Fasos-edition%2Fasos-edition-sophia-plunge-lace-wedding-dress-with-pleated-skirt%2Fprd%2F14107765%3Fslpfid%3D2" rel="sponsored" title="ASOS EDITION wedding dress"><strong>ASOS EDITION dress</strong></a> is part of their bridal collection and has a luxurious design and feel, despite its price tag of just &pound;135. The floor-length gown features a plunge neck and lace sleeves with a low back and flowing pleated skirt, making it as flattering as it is affordable.</p> <p><strong>RELATED:&nbsp;<a data-ved="2ahUKEwjw59P-2OLxAhWD3OAKHevWAdMQFnoECAIQAA" href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/brides/gallery/2020011583234/high-street-wedding-dresses/1/" ping="/url?sa=t&amp;source=web&amp;rct=j&amp;url=https://www.hellomagazine.com/brides/gallery/2020011583234/high-street-wedding-dresses/1/&amp;ved=2ahUKEwjw59P-2OLxAhWD3OAKHevWAdMQFnoECAIQAA">High street wedding dresses that look more expensive than they are</a></strong></p> <p><img alt="ASOS-edition-wedding-dress" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/news/20210719117794/asos-backless-wedding-dress-best-reviews/0-570-183/asos-edition-wedding-dress-z.jpg" title="ASOS-edition-wedding-dress" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>ASOS EDITION&nbsp;Sophia plunge lace wedding dress, &pound;135, <a class="aff_text" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=CLT-U250--08/09/21&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.asos.com%2Fasos-edition%2Fasos-edition-sophia-plunge-lace-wedding-dress-with-pleated-skirt%2Fprd%2F14107765%3Fslpfid%3D2%26irgwc%3D1%26clickid%3D_rxzbumikigkft0cdxka03fe3c22xrivjkth2koqw00%26affid%3D25376%26pubref%3D10078" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="ASOS EDITION wedding dress">ASOS</a></strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=CLT-U250--08/09/21&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.asos.com%2Fasos-edition%2Fasos-edition-sophia-plunge-lace-wedding-dress-with-pleated-skirt%2Fprd%2F14107765%3Fslpfid%3D2%26irgwc%3D1%26clickid%3D_rxzbumikigkft0cdxka03fe3c22xrivjkth2koqw00%26affid%3D25376%26pubref%3D10078" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="ASOS EDITION wedding dress">SHOP NOW</a></h6> <p>&#39;I could not believe how great this looks, the quality is great and I did not expect it to be as such either. Absolutely great, I&#39;m using it as my wedding dress in 9 weeks time!&#39; says one review.</p> <p>Another wrote: &#39;I am in love with this dress. The fit is so perfect, so elegant and flattering.&#39;</p> <p><strong>MORE: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/brides/20210702116645/best-casual-wedding-dresses/">Casual wedding dresses for a low-key ceremony</a></strong></p> <p dir="ltr">While another customer commented: &#39;I was surprised by the quality of this dress. It has nothing less than much more expensive boutique gowns!&#39;</p> <p dir="ltr">And one said: &#39;I bought this dress for my wedding. The material is so soft and the lace is beautiful! I can&#39;t wait to wear it.&#39;</p> <p dir="ltr">Some reviews say the dress needed a little altering, either on the length or around the top area, but it could easily be tailored for the perfect fit. Overall it&#39;s still a far more budget-friendly option than splashing out on a designer gown.</p> <p dir="ltr"><strong>MORE:&nbsp;<a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/brides/20210604114648/wedding-dress-rental-hire/">Best wedding dress hire sites in 2021: Selfridges, HURR &amp; more</a></strong></p> <p style="font-size:12px"><em>HELLO!&#39;s selection is editorial and independently chosen &ndash; we only feature items our editors love and approve of. HELLO! may collect a share of sales or other compensation from the links on this page. To find out more visit our </em><a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/news/2019061174038/reader-information-on-affiliate-links/">FAQ page</a>.</p>
item.dc:creator: Hollie Brotherton

item.title: Remember Molly-Maeâs stunning bridesmaid dress? Itâs finally available to shop
item.description: <p>Former <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/love-island/"><em><strong>Love Island</strong></em></a> star <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/molly-mae-hague/"><strong>Molly-Mae Hague</strong></a>&nbsp;shared a series of stunning photos from her day as a bridesmaid for her mum&#39;s wedding in July&nbsp;&ndash; and fans were obsessed with her dress.&nbsp;</p> <p><strong>RELATED:&nbsp;<a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/brides/20210715117599/best-rooftop-wedding-venues-in-london/">5 best rooftop wedding venues in London for stunning panoramic views</a></strong></p> <p>Taking to Instagram, Molly-Mae and her lookalike sister Zoe stunned in the glamorous navy bridesmaid dresses. <strong>Complete with an elegant cross halter neckline and flattering open bust design, the twinning duo looked immaculate for the occasion in the backless floor-length gowns.</strong></p> <p><img alt="molly-sister-mum" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/brides/20210718117746/molly-mae-bridesmaid-dress-pretty-little-thing/0-570-6/molly-sister-mum-z.jpg" title="molly-sister-mum" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>The stunning trio: Molly-Mae with her sister Zoe and mum Debbie&nbsp;</strong></p> <p>&quot;Thank you @prettylittlething for designing mine and my sister&#39;s beautiful bridesmaid dresses&hellip; so lucky&quot;, wrote Molly-Mae, proving that high street wedding fashion can be luxury-looking without a jaw-dropping price tag.&nbsp;</p> <p>&quot;Did you guys think I&#39;d get @prettylittlething to design me a bridesmaid dress without you being able to shop it too?&quot; she teased at the time, and now <a class="aff_text" href="http://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=CLT-U50-OMP-23/08/21&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.prettylittlething.com%2Fnavy-bridesmaid-corset-detail-cross-front-maxi-dress.html" rel="sponsored" title="Pretty Little Thing dress"><strong>it&#39;s finally available to buy on PLT</strong></a>!&nbsp;</p> <p><img alt="Pretty-Little-Thing-dress" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/brides/20210718117746/molly-mae-bridesmaid-dress-pretty-little-thing/0-580-738/pretty-little-thing-dress-z.jpg" title="Pretty-Little-Thing-dress" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Navy bridesmaid maxi dress, &pound;40, <a class="aff_text" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=CLT-U50-OMP-23/08/21&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.prettylittlething.com%2Fnavy-bridesmaid-corset-detail-cross-front-maxi-dress.html" rel="sponsored" title="Pretty Little Thing dress">Pretty Little Thing</a></strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=CLT-U50-OMP-23/08/21&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.prettylittlething.com%2Fnavy-bridesmaid-corset-detail-cross-front-maxi-dress.html" rel="sponsored" title="Pretty Little Thing dress">SHOP NOW</a></h6> <p>Fans rushed to compliment the 22-year-old and her sister, taking to the comments to leave a flurry of heart-eye emojis under the post.</p> <p><img alt="molly-mae" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/brides/20210718117746/molly-mae-bridesmaid-dress-pretty-little-thing/0-570-4/molly-mae-z.jpg" title="molly-mae" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>The star wore a <a class="aff_text" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.prettylittlething.com%2Fclothing%2Fdresses%2Fwedding-guest-dresses.html%3Fid%3D1742%26page%3D2%26ajax%3D0" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="pretty little thing">PrettyLittleThing</a> bridesmaid dress</strong></p> <p>&quot;You both look absolutely beautiful. Congratulations to the bride and groom too,&quot; wrote one fan, whilst another sweetly shared: &quot;The most beautiful sisters! Hope you had the best day.&quot;</p> <p>A third fan commented: <strong>&quot;How beautiful, just waiting for the you and Tommy pics now [heart emoji]&quot;.</strong></p> <p>Molly-Mae met her beau <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/tommy-fury/"><strong>Tommy Fury </strong></a>on ITV&#39;s <em>Love Island</em>, and the fan-favourite couple have been together ever since. The beautiful star coined the professional boxer as her &quot;forever date&quot; in an adorable selfie of the pair posted to her story.</p> <p><img alt="molly-mae-tommy-fury" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/brides/20210718117746/molly-mae-bridesmaid-dress-pretty-little-thing/0-570-3/molly-mae-tommy-fury-z.jpg" title="molly-mae-tommy-fury" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Molly-Mae and Tommy met on Love Island</strong></p> <p>If you&#39;re looking to take inspiration from Molly-Mae&#39;s bridesmaid look, we&rsquo;ve got you covered. Whether you&rsquo;re seeking floor-length silky gowns or fabulous sparkly numbers for your wedding day, <em><strong>HELLO!</strong></em> have compiled a <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/brides/20210413110676/best-high-street-bridesmaids-dresses/"><strong>stunning edit of bridesmaid dresses</strong></a> currently available on the high street - plus, they are affordable too!</p> <fieldset class="video video-en" data-autoplay="false" data-idplayer="" data-idvideo="C5DBHVOO" data-isplayercodeneeded="true" data-provider="jwplayer" data-videoads="false"><iframe frameborder="0" width="560" height="315" src="https://cdn.jwplayer.com/players/C5DBHVOO-UU9GOUT4.html"></iframe></fieldset> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>WATCH: Molly-Mae Hague and Tommy Fury&#39;s enduring Love Island journey</strong></p> <p><strong>RELATED:&nbsp;<a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/brides/20210413110676/best-high-street-bridesmaids-dresses/" rel="" target="_blank">Pretty high-street bridesmaid dresses to fall in love with</a></strong></p> <p><strong>MORE:&nbsp;<a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/brides/gallery/2020011583234/high-street-wedding-dresses/1/">33 high street wedding dresses that look more expensive than they are</a></strong></p> <p style="font-size:12px"><em>HELLO!&#39;s selection is editorial and independently chosen &ndash; we only feature items our editors love and approve of. HELLO! may collect a share of sales or other compensation from the links on this page. To find out more visit our </em><a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/news/2019061174038/reader-information-on-affiliate-links/">FAQ page</a>.</p>

item.title: The only 4 pairs of shoes Kate Middleton would pack for a UK staycation
item.description: <p dir="ltr">Prepping for a <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/staycation/"><strong>staycation</strong></a>? You know what they say &ndash; give a girl the right pair of <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/shoes/"&gt ;<strong>shoes</strong></a> and she can conquer the world. No matter where you&#39;re heading on holiday, we&#39;ve looked to <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/kate-middleton/"><strong>Kate Middleton</strong></a> to inspire us with our packing dilemma.</p> <p dir="ltr">From box-fresh white trainers to heeled sandals, and Kate&#39;s iconic espadrille wedges, the high street is full of fashionable and functional designs that&#39;ll keep you comfortable on your staycation. Here are some of our favourite pairs...</p> <p><strong>RELATED:&nbsp;<a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/news/20210709117195/best-sparkly-flat-sandals/">9 sparkly flat sandals to glam up your evening wear now that heels are redundant</a></strong></p> <h3 dir="ltr">Kate Middleton&#39;s holiday shoe essential #1:&nbsp;A low heel comfy dinner shoe</h3> <p dir="ltr"><img alt="kate-comfy-heels" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/royal-style/20210715117509/kate-middleton-favourite-shoes-she-would-pack-for-a-staycation/0-569-242/kate-comfy-heels-z.jpg" title="kate-comfy-heels" /></p> <p dir="ltr" style="text-align:center"><strong>You can never go wrong with a pair of comfy dinner shoes &ndash; just ask Kate</strong></p> <p dir="ltr" wedges &ndash; minus the price tag.&nbsp;</p> <p><img alt="pink-wedges" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="other stories">&amp; Other Stories</a></strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" item.title: 17 things we really need from the Nordstrom Rack Labor Day home sale before it ends today
item.description: <p>Are you looking for an easy way to zhoosh up your home? Sometimes something simple like a new set of pretty bedding, or kitchenware that makes cooking fun will do just that. And<strong> <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/nordstrom/">Nordstrom</a> Rack</strong> is here to help!</p> <p>In the discount retailer&rsquo;s <strong>Labor Day Clear The Rack sale</strong>, the prices of selected clearance items have been slashed by an <strong>extra 25% through September 6.</strong></p> <p><strong>RELATED:&nbsp; <a data-cke-saved-href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/royal-style/20210624116100/nordstrom-rack-buys-meghan-markle-would-love/" href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/royal-style/20210624116100/nordstrom-rack-buys-meghan-markle-would-love/"></a><a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/news/20210831120702/best-labor-day-weekend-sales-deals-discounts/">28 best Labor Day sales to shop right now</a></strong></p> <p>Check out the full clearance sale to find amazing discounts on <strong><a class="aff_text" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.nordstromrack.com%2Fclearance%2FHome%2Fbedding" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="Bedding sale">bedding</a>, <a class="aff_text" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.nordstromrack.com%2Fclearance%2FHome%2FKitchen%2520%26%2520Tabletop" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="kitchen sale">kitchen</a>, <a class="aff_text" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.nordstromrack.com%2Fclearance%2FHome%2FHome%2520Decor" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="decor sale">decor</a>&nbsp;</strong>and<strong>&nbsp;<a class="aff_text" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.nordstromrack.com%2Fclearance%2FHome%2FBath" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="Bath sale">bath</a></strong>, from towel sets and wall art to cookware and candles.</p> <p><strong>MORE LABOR DAY SALES:</strong></p> <p><a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/celebrity-style/20210901120842/coach-sale-jennifer-lopez-favorite-bag-basquiat-style/" rel="" target="_blank"><strong>Grab a Coach bag for up to 75% off - including JLo&#39;s fave Basquiat style</strong></a></p> <p><a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/news/20210831120752/asos-huge-labor-day-sale/" rel="" target="_blank"><strong>Stop everything! ASOS has a huge Labor Day Sale on right now</strong></a></p> <p><a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/news/20210826120382/macys-sale-best-deals-and-discounts/" target="_blank"><strong>Macy&#39;s LABOR DAY sale: Shop the 26 best deals at up to 60% off</strong></a></p> <p>We can&rsquo;t resist the mood-lifting homeware that&rsquo;s on sale - so we&rsquo;ve picked out our favorites that will boost your space in an instant. <a href="https://go.hellomagazine.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.nordstromrack.com%2Fclearance%2FHome%3Fsid%3D1827924/"><strong>Shop the full sale on home buys</strong>,</a> or keep reading for our edit!</p> <h2>Shop Nordstrom&#39;s Labor Day Clear The Rack sale:</h2> <p>&nbsp;</p> <p><img alt="nordstrom rack sale pots and pans kitchen" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/homes/20210715117570/nordstrom-rack-home-sale-best-deals/0-584-888/nordstrom-rack-sale-pots-and-pans-kitchen-z.jpg" title="nordstrom rack sale pots and pans kitchen" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Nutrichef 11-Piece Pots and Pans set, was <span class="_3F6ze _3qL_F" id="original-price"><span class="_2VQ4q" id="">$149.99</span></span> CLEAR THE RACK PRICE: <span class="SC9pq _2eJnc _3qL_F" id="current-price"><span>$<span class="_3PQdj _3bSOL" id="current-price-string">64.</span>67</span></span>, <a class="aff_text" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=HME---&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.nordstromrack.com%2Fs%2Fnutrichef-kitchenware-non-stick-pots-pans-set-blue-11-piece-set%2F6080854" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="Nordstrom Rack home sale">Nordstrom Rack</a></strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=HME---&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.nordstromrack.com%2Fs%2Fnutrichef-kitchenware-non-stick-pots-pans-set-blue-11-piece-set%2F6080854" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="Nordstrom Rack home sale"><strong>SHOP NOW</strong></a></h6> <p>A great starter set for college students or just what you need to upgrade your old pots and pans! This stylish 11-piece cookware set includes a cook pot, saucepan, Dutch oven, small fry pan, large fry pan, three lids and three heat-resistant kitchen utensils.</p> <p>&nbsp;</p> <p><img alt="nordstrom rack labor day sale home tray" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/homes/20210715117570/nordstrom-rack-home-sale-best-deals/0-584-887/nordstrom-rack-labor-day-sale-home-tray-z.jpg" title="nordstrom rack labor day sale home tray" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Trina Turk Tray, was $39.99 CLEAR THE RACK PRICE: $14.04, <a class="aff_text" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=HME---&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.nordstromrack.com%2Fs%2Fjay-imports-trina-turk-lemon-zest-rectangular-tray%2F6073545" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="Nordstrom Rack home sale">Nordstrom Rack</a></strong></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;xcust=HME---&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.nordstromrack.com%2Fs%2Fjay-imports-trina-turk-lemon-zest-rectangular-tray%2F6073545" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="Nordstrom Rack home sale"><strong>SHOP NOW</strong></a></h6> <p>Add some instant cheer to your home with this lemon motif tray. item.title: 11 stylish swimsuits for the UK heatwave 2021: From M&S to Boden, H&M & MORE
item.description: <p dir="ltr">If you&#39;re excited about the upcoming&nbsp;<a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/summer/"><strong>heatwave</strong></a>, you might be inspired to&nbsp;(safely) catch a few rays in the&nbsp;<a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/garden/"><strong>garden</strong></a>,&nbsp;or you might pack up and go on a mini&nbsp;<a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/staycation/"><strong>staycation</strong></a>. Whatever your plans you&#39;ll need a chic, stylish swimsuit to wear under your summer dress.&nbsp;</p> <p dir="ltr">Thankfully, you&#39;re in luck because the high-street is awash with gorgeous styles. Now,&nbsp;I&#39;ve ditched the <strong>Love Island</strong>-esque&nbsp;cutaway one-pieces here, and chosen fuss-free easy-to-wear styles for the garden or the beach.</p> <p dir="ltr">Animal print seems to be a major trend this year - and the new-in onepiece from <strong><a class="aff_text" href="http://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.marksandspencer.com%2Fanimal-print-padded-scoop-neck-swimsuit%2Fp%2Fclp60495024%3Fcolor%3DBROWNMIX" rel="sponsored" title="m&amp;s">Marks &amp; Spencer</a> </strong>might be just what you&#39;re after. Me personally, I&#39;m all about the bright colours right now, so the <a class="aff_text" href="http://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.boden.co.uk%2Fen-gb%2Fsantorini-swimsuit-cherry-pink%2Fsty-s0157-bpk%3Fcat%3DC1_S2_G17_G80" rel="sponsored" title="boden"><strong>pink Boden swimsuit</strong></a> and the floral styles from <strong>ASOS</strong>, <strong>Seafolly</strong>, and&nbsp;<strong>Draper James</strong> - Reese Witherspoon&#39;s fashion brand - are all on my summer wish list.&nbsp;</p> <p dir="ltr"><strong>RELATED:&nbsp;<a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/news/20210624116096/marks-and-spencer-tummy-control-swimsuit-amazing-reviews/">This tummy-control Marks and Spencer swimsuit has been described as &lsquo;perfect&rsquo; by fans</a>&nbsp;</strong></p> <h2 dir="ltr">Let us serve you the best stylish swimsuits for women in summer 2021&hellip;&nbsp;</h2> <p><img alt="boden-red-swimsuit" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/hfm/20210713117404/best-swimsuits-for-women/0-572-543/boden-red-swimsuit-z.jpg" title="boden-red-swimsuit" /></p> <p dir="ltr" style="text-align:center"><strong>Minori&nbsp;swimsuit, &pound;65, <a class="aff_text" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.boden.co.uk%2Fen-gb%2Fminori-swimsuit-red-colourblock%2Fsty-s0150-red%3Fcat%3DC1_S2_G17" rel="sponsored" title="Boden swimsuit">Boden </a></strong></p> <h6 dir="ltr" style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.boden.co.uk%2Fen-gb%2Fminori-swimsuit-red-colourblock%2Fsty-s0150-red%3Fcat%3DC1_S2_G17" rel="sponsored" title="Boden swimsuit">SHOP NOW</a><strong>&nbsp;</strong></h6> <p dir="ltr">This Boden swimsuit has been described as being as supportive as a best friend.&nbsp;</p> <p><img alt="ms-leopard-swimsuit" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/hfm/20210713117404/best-swimsuits-for-women/0-572-544/ms-leopard-swimsuit-z.jpg" title="ms-leopard-swimsuit" /></p> <p dir="ltr" style="text-align:center"><strong>Leopard print swimsuit, &pound;19.50,&nbsp;<a class="aff_text" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.marksandspencer.com%2Fanimal-print-padded-scoop-neck-swimsuit%2Fp%2Fclp60495024%3Fcolor%3DBROWNMIX" rel="sponsored" title="M&amp;S swimsuit">Marks &amp; Spencer</a>&nbsp;</strong></p> <h6 dir="ltr" style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.marksandspencer.com%2Fanimal-print-padded-scoop-neck-swimsuit%2Fp%2Fclp60495024%3Fcolor%3DBROWNMIX" rel="sponsored" title="M&amp;S swimsuit">SHOP NOW&nbsp;</a>&nbsp;</h6> <p dir="ltr">For less than &pound;20, you can&#39;t go wrong with this M&amp;S swimsuit - and it&#39;s versatile. You could wear this as a bodysuit and team with jeans and a white linen shirt. Divine!&nbsp;</p> <p dir="ltr"><img alt="nasty-gal-plus-swimsuit" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/hfm/20210713117404/best-swimsuits-for-women/0-572-555/nasty-gal-plus-swimsuit-z.jpg" title="nasty-gal-plus-swimsuit" /></p> <p dir="ltr" style="text-align:center"><strong>Plus-size off the shoulder swimsuit, &pound;18.20, <a class="aff_text" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.nastygal.com%2Fgb%2Fplus-size-off-the-shoulder-ruffle-swimsuit%2FAGG44952.html" rel="sponsored" title="nasty gal">Nasty Gal</a></strong></p> <h6 dir="ltr" style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.nastygal.com%2Fgb%2Fplus-size-off-the-shoulder-ruffle-swimsuit%2FAGG44952.html" rel="sponsored" title="nasty gal">SHOP NOW</a></h6> <p dir="ltr">This swimsuit is super stylish, comfortable and you&#39;ll feel a million dollars in it. What more could you want?&nbsp;</p> <p dir="ltr"><img alt="yellow-asos-swimsuit" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/hfm/20210713117404/best-swimsuits-for-women/0-572-549/yellow-asos-swimsuit-z.jpg" title="yellow-asos-swimsuit" /></p> <p dir="ltr" style="text-align:center"><strong>Lemon swimsuit, &pound;26, <a class="aff_text" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.asos.com%2Fasos-design%2Fasos-design-crinkle-low-back-swimsuit-in-yellow%2Fprd%2F200310767%3Fcolourwayid%3D200310770%26SearchQuery%3Dswimsuit" rel="sponsored" title="ASOS Design swimsuit">ASOS DESIGN</a>&nbsp;</strong></p> <h6 dir="ltr" style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.asos.com%2Fasos-design%2Fasos-design-crinkle-low-back-swimsuit-in-yellow%2Fprd%2F200310767%3Fcolourwayid%3D200310770%26SearchQuery%3Dswimsuit" rel="sponsored" title="asos swimsuit">SHOP NOW</a>&nbsp;</h6> <p dir="ltr">Thanks to the crinkle material, this ASOS Design&nbsp;swimsuit will be super flattering.&nbsp;</p> <p dir="ltr"><strong>MORE: <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/hfm/20210506112564/best-long-sleeved-swimsuits-rash-vest-style/">The best rash swimsuits to channel Adele this summer</a></strong></p> <p dir="ltr"><img alt="reiss-swimsuit" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/hfm/20210713117404/best-swimsuits-for-women/0-568-326/reiss-swimsuit-z.jpg" title="reiss-swimsuit" /></p> <p dir="ltr" style="text-align:center"><strong>Gia printed swimsuit, &pound;90, <a class="aff_text" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.reiss.com%2Fp%2Fprinted-swimsuit-with-lattice-detail-womens-gia-in-blue%2F%3Fcategory_id%3D1128%26gaEeList%3DW%2520-%2520Swimwear" rel="sponsored" title="reiss swimsuit">Reiss</a></strong></p> <h6 dir="ltr" style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.reiss.com%2Fp%2Fprinted-swimsuit-with-lattice-detail-womens-gia-in-blue%2F%3Fcategory_id%3D1128%26gaEeList%3DW%2520-%2520Swimwear" rel="sponsored" title="reiss swimsuit">SHOP NOW</a></h6> <p dir="ltr">The Gia printed swimsuit is the kind of piece that you&#39;ll have on rotation all season long. Designed with removable padding, it&#39;ll be a win-win every year. Wear with oversized sunglasses and a woven hat for an uber glam look.</p> <p dir="ltr"><img alt="hush-swimsuit" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/hfm/20210713117404/best-swimsuits-for-women/0-568-322/hush-swimsuit-z.jpg" title="hush-swimsuit" /></p> <p dir="ltr" style="text-align:center"><strong>Cut-out ruched swimsuit, &pound;69, <a class="aff_text" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.hush-uk.com%2Fcut-out-ruched-swimsuit-light-graphic-floral%2F002486-3519.html" rel="sponsored" title="hush swimsuit">Hush</a></strong></p> <h6 dir="ltr" style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.hush-uk.com%2Fcut-out-ruched-swimsuit-light-graphic-floral%2F002486-3519.html" rel="sponsored" title="hush swimsuit">SHOP NOW</a></h6> <p dir="ltr">How cute is this swimsuit? The halterneck style has cut outs at the front and ruching along the side to accentuate and flatter your body.</p> <p dir="ltr"><img alt="savannah-miller-swimsuit" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/hfm/20210713117404/best-swimsuits-for-women/0-568-327/savannah-miller-swimsuit-z.jpg" title="savannah-miller-swimsuit" /></p> <p dir="ltr" style="text-align:center"><strong>Savannah Miller X Next zebra print swimsuit, &pound;48, <a class="aff_text" href="https://www.next.co.uk/style/st753569/947145947145" rel="sponsored" title="Next swimsuit">Next</a></strong></p> <h6 dir="ltr" style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://www.next.co.uk/style/st753569/947145947145" rel="sponsored" title="Next swimsuit">SHOP NOW</a></h6> <p dir="ltr">Sienna Miller&#39;s fashion designer sister has designed a swimwear collection for NEXT, and this swimsuit is up there with one of the chicest styles we&#39;ve seen. Matching items are also available.&nbsp;</p> <p dir="ltr"><strong>MORE:&nbsp;<a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/hfm/20210601114365/diamond-tennis-necklace-fashion-trend/">The diamond tennis necklace&nbsp;is&nbsp;2021&#39;s top jewellery trend for summer</a></strong></p> <p><img alt="pour-moi-swimsuit-black-white" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/hfm/20210713117404/best-swimsuits-for-women/0-568-325/pour-moi-swimsuit-black-white-z.jpg" title="pour-moi-swimsuit-black-white" /></p> <p dir="ltr" style="text-align:center"><strong>Belted swimsuit, &pound;49, <a class="aff_text" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.pourmoi.co.uk%2Fproducts%2Fremovable-straps-belted-control-swimsuit%2F" rel="sponsored" title="pour moi swimsuit">Pour Moi</a>&nbsp;</strong></p> <h6 dir="ltr" style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.pourmoi.co.uk%2Fproducts%2Fremovable-straps-belted-control-swimsuit%2F" rel="sponsored" title="pour moi swimsuit">SHOP NOW</a></h6> <p dir="ltr">Classic and stylish, this belted swimming costume from Jess Wright&#39;s edit doesn&#39;t just look chic, it&#39;s the secret to the ultimate hourglass silhouette.</p> <p dir="ltr"><img alt="hm-black-swimsuit" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/hfm/20210713117404/best-swimsuits-for-women/0-568-321/hm-black-swimsuit-z.jpg" title="hm-black-swimsuit" /></p> <p dir="ltr" style="text-align:center"><strong>Padded cup swimsuit, &pound;24.99, <a class="aff_text" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww2.hm.com%2Fen_gb%2Fproductpage.0966014003.html" rel="sponsored" title="h&amp;m swimsuit">H&amp;M</a></strong></p> <h6 dir="ltr" style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww2.hm.com%2Fen_gb%2Fproductpage.0966014003.html" rel="sponsored" title="h&amp;m swimsuit">SHOP NOW</a></h6> <p dir="ltr">If you prefer a classic swimsuit, H&amp;M has some excellent black one-piece offerings - but they do sell out at the speed of light.&nbsp;</p> <p dir="ltr"><img alt="seafolly-swimsuit" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/hfm/20210713117404/best-swimsuits-for-women/0-568-328/seafolly-swimsuit-z.jpg" title="seafolly-swimsuit" /></p> <p dir="ltr" style="text-align:center"><strong>Seafolly printed swimsuit, &pound;105, <a class="aff_text" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.johnlewis.com%2Fseafolly-summer-memoirs-deep-v-neck-swimsuit-blue-multi%2Fp5543989" rel="sponsored" title="John Lewis swimsuit">John Lewis</a></strong></p> <h6 dir="ltr" style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.johnlewis.com%2Fseafolly-summer-memoirs-deep-v-neck-swimsuit-blue-multi%2Fp5543989" rel="sponsored" title="John Lewis seafolly swimsuit">SHOP NOW</a></h6> <p dir="ltr">Swimsuit lovers know Seafolly is an exceptional choice for swimwear -&nbsp;you&#39;ll bring this one out time and time again.&nbsp;</p> <p dir="ltr"><img alt="draper-james-swimsuit" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/hfm/20210713117404/best-swimsuits-for-women/0-568-320/draper-james-swimsuit-z.jpg" title="draper-james-swimsuit" /></p> <p dir="ltr" style="text-align:center"><strong>Draper James one-piece swimsuit, &pound;47.25, <a class="aff_text" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.landsend.co.uk%2FWomens_Draper_James_x_Lands_End_Twist_Front_Swimsuit%2Fpp%2FP_41400.html%3Fcgid%3D15151%26dwvar_P__41400_color%3DF0K" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.landsend.co.uk%2FWomens_Draper_James_x_Lands_End_Twist_Front_Swimsuit%2Fpp%2FP_41400.html%3Fcgid%3D15151%26dwvar_P__41400_color%3DF0K" rel="sponsored" title="draper james swimsuit">SHOP NOW</a></h6> <p dir="ltr">Draper James is Reese Witherspoon&#39;s brand and you can shop the swimwear edit on Lands End. The swimsuits are discounted right now so you&#39;d be mad to miss out.&nbsp;</p> <p dir="ltr"><strong>RELATED:&nbsp;<a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/hfm/20210430112069/best-casual-jumpsuits-playsuits-for-women/" rel="" target="_blank">16 best super casual jumpsuits &amp; playsuits to lounge in all summer long</a></strong></p> <p style="font-size:12px"><em>HELLO!&#39;s selection is editorial and independently chosen &ndash; we only feature items our editors love and approve of. item.title: Kate Middleton spotted carrying essentials in dreamy designer tote bag - and it's currently on sale
item.description: <p><a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/kate-middleton/"><strong>The Duchess of Cambridge</strong></a>&nbsp;has a favourite bag to keep her essentials in, it seems! The royal&nbsp;showed her patriotic pride by <a href="https://www.hellom agazine.com/fashion/celebrity-style/20210711117283/kate-middleton-glamorous-jewelry-wembley/" target="_blank"><strong>wearing a chic red and white outfit</strong></a> for the dramatic Euros football final at Wembley earlier in July - but she also carried a more practical accessory with her.</p> <p>Since Kate had a busy day, <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/royal-style/20210711117131/kate-middleton-baby-pink-dress-wimbledon-mens-singles-final/"><strong>attending the Wimbledon Men&#39;s Final</strong></a> before heading to the football with husband Prince William and son Prince George, it seems that she took a handy tote bag with her to keep in the car.</p> <p><strong>MORE:&nbsp;<a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/royal-style/gallery/20210627116187/kate-middleton-stunning-wimbledon-outfits/1/" target="_blank">17 times&nbsp;Kate Middleton stunned with her iconic Wimbledon outfits</a></strong></p> <p>While at the match, the royal was pictured with her <a class="aff_text" href="https://go.skimresources.com?id=130574X1592710&amp;xs=1&amp;url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.mulberry.com%2Fgb%2Fshop%2Fwomen%2Fwhats-new%2Fsmall-darley-mulberry-green-heavy-grain" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="mulberry"><strong>Mulberry Darley mini bag</strong></a> in red croc, but she was later seen leaving with her family with her <a class="aff_text" href="https://geni.us/kate-longchamp" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="longchamp"><strong>Longchamp Le Pliage bag</strong></a> on her lap - a staple that she has loved for well over a decade.</p> <p><img alt="kate-leaving-wembley-longchamp" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/royal-style/20210712117329/kate-middleton-travel-tote-bag-longchamp/0-567-992/kate-leaving-wembley-longchamp-z.jpg" title="kate-leaving-wembley-longchamp" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Kate was pictured with her Longchamp &#39;Le Pliage&#39; bag. IMAGE: Magic Moments UK</strong></p> <p>The classic Longchamp tote is seeing a resurgence once again, and we&#39;re not surprised Kate loves it for packing her essentials inside. Even better, it&#39;s currently reduced in the sale online, from &pound;80 down to &pound;64.</p> <p><strong>MORE:&nbsp;<a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/royal-style/20210710117189/royal-outfits-july-2021-wimbledon-euros-monaco/">Royal Style Watch!&nbsp;From Kate Middleton at Wimbledon to Princess Mary at Wembley</a></strong></p> <p><img alt="longchamp-bag" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/royal-style/20210712117329/kate-middleton-travel-tote-bag-longchamp/0-567-994/longchamp-bag-z.jpg" title="longchamp-bag" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Le Pliage bag, &pound;64 / $125, </strong><a class="aff_text" href="https://geni.us/kate-longchamp" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="longchamp"><strong>Longchamp</strong></a></p> <h6 style="text-align:center"><a class="product__button" href="https://geni.us/kate-longchamp" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="longchamp">SHOP NOW</a></h6> <p>Kate appeared to be carrying the &#39;Desert&#39; shade, which is a chic camel brown - though she is also known to own the navy blue style and a number of larger travel bags. You can shop <a class="aff_text" href="http://go.skimresources.com/?id=130574X1592710&url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.selfridges.com%2FGB%2Fen%2Fcat%2Flongchamp%2F" rel="sponsored" target="_blank" title="selfridges longchamp"><strong>a range of Longchamp bags at Selfridges</strong></a>, too.</p> <p><img alt="kate-middleton-luggage-longchamp" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/royal-style/20210712117329/kate-middleton-travel-tote-bag-longchamp/0-567-987/kate-middleton-luggage-longchamp-z.jpg" title="kate-middleton-luggage-longchamp" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Kate often uses her Longchamp bags when travelling</strong></p> <p>Back in 2016, the Duchess&#39; assistant and stylist Natasha Archer was pictured carrying Kate&#39;s bags as they arrived in Assam, India during Kate and William&#39;s royal tour of the country - and amongst the luggage, a Longchamp tote is clearly visible.</p> <p><strong>MORE:&nbsp;<a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/fashion/royal-style/gallery/20210708117104/royal-ladies-breaking-royal-fashion-protocol/1/" rel="" target="_blank">10 times defiant royal ladies have broken fashion protocol with their outfits</a></strong></p> <p>Kate also famously carried a Longchamp bag during her graduation from St Andrews back in June 2005, and was spotted with one of her &#39;Le Pliage&#39; totes while at Brisbane Airport in 2012 during a stopover. It&#39;s clearly a travel essential!</p> <p><img alt="meghan-markle-longchamp" src="https://www.hellomagazine.com/imagenes/fashion/royal-style/20210712117329/kate-middleton-travel-tote-bag-longchamp/0-567-988/meghan-markle-longchamp-z.jpg" title="meghan-markle-longchamp" /></p> <p style="text-align:center"><strong>Duchess Meghan was also pictured with a Longchamp bag in 2005</strong></p> <p>In fact, sister-in-law the <a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/tags/meghan-markle/"><strong>Duchess of Sussex</strong></a> has also been pictured with her Longchamp bag in the past, while the likes of Jennifer Lopez and Alexa Chung are also fans. Kate&#39;s sister and style twin Pippa Middleton is also fond of her Le Pliage totes.</p> <p>Something tells us &#39;the Kate effect&#39; is about to kick in again, so hurry if you want to snap up your own...</p> <p style="font-size:12px"><em>HELLO!&#39;s selection is editorial and independently chosen &ndash; we only feature items our editors love and approve of. HELLO! may collect a share of sales or other compensation from the links on this page. To find out more visit our </em><a href="https://www.hellomagazine.com/news/2019061174038/reader-information-on-affiliate-links/">FAQ page</a>.</p>
item.dc:creator: Fiona Ward
